title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'greets you well, Baron of Bradwardine and Tully-Veolan, and is sorry
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

author: Scott, Walter

text: of such sound principles, 'for when folks are banding together, feeble
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

author: Scott, Walter

text: Through the gorge of this glen they found access to a black bog, of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: tremendous extent, full of large pit-holes, which they traversed
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: with great difficulty and some danger, by tracks which no one but a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Highlander could have followed. The path itself, or rather the portion
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of more solid ground on which the travellers half walked, half waded,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was rough, broken, and in many places quaggy and unsound. Sometimes the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: ground was so completely unsafe, that it was necessary to spring from
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: one hillock to another, the space between being incapable of bearing
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the human weight. This was an easy matter to the Highlanders, who
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: wore thin-soled brogues fit for the purpose, and moved with a peculiar
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: springing step; but Edward began to find the exercise, to which he was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: unaccustomed, more fatiguing than he expected. The lingering twilight
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: served to show them through this Serbonian bog, but deserted them almost
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: totally at the bottom of a steep and very stony hill, which it was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the travellers' next toilsome task to ascend. The night, however,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was pleasant, and not dark; and Waverley, calling up mental energy to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: support personal fatigue, held on his march gallantly, though envying in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: his heart his Highland attendants, who continued, without a symptom
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of abated vigour, the rapid and swinging pace, or rather trot, which,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: according to his computation, had already brought them fifteen miles
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: upon their journey.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: After crossing this mountain, and descending on the other side towards a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: in consequence of which Edward's baggage was shifted from the shoulders
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of the gamekeeper to those of one of the gillies, and the former was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: sent off with the other mountaineer in a direction different from
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: that of the three remaining travellers. On asking the meaning of this
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: separation, Waverley was told that the Lowlander must go to a hamlet
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: about three miles off for the night; for unless it was some very
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: particular friend, Donald Bean Lean, the worthy person whom they
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: supposed to be possessed of the cattle, did not much approve of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: strangers approaching his retreat. This seemed reasonable, and silenced
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: a qualm of suspicion which came across Edward's mind, when he saw
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: himself, at such a place and such an hour, deprived of his only Lowland
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: companion. And Evan immediately afterwards added, 'that indeed he
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: himself had better get forward, and announce their approach to Donald
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Bean Lean, as the arrival of a SIDIER ROY (red soldier) might otherwise
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: be a disagreeable surprise.' And without waiting for an answer, in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: jockey phrase, he trotted out, and putting himself to a very round pace,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was out of sight in an instant.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Waverley was now left to his own meditations, for his attendant with the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: battle-axe spoke very little English. They were traversing a thick, and,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: as it seemed, an endless wood of pines, and consequently the path was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: altogether indiscernible in the murky darkness which surrounded them.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The Highlander, however, seemed to trace it by instinct, without the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: hesitation of a moment, and Edward followed his footsteps as close as he
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: could.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: After journeying a considerable time in silence, he could not help
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: asking, 'Was it far to the end of their journey?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Ta cove was tree, four mile; but as Duinhe-wassel was a wee taiglit,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Donald could, tat is, might--would--should send ta curragh.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: This conveyed no information. The CURRAGH which was promised might be a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: man, a horse, a cart, or chaise; and no more could be got from the man
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: with the battle-axe, but a repetition of 'Aich ay! ta curragh.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: But in a short time Edward began to conceive his meaning, when, issuing
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: from the wood, he found himself on the banks of a large river or lake,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: where his conductor gave him to understand they must sit down for a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: little while. The moon, which now began to rise, showed obscurely
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the expanse of water which spread before them, and the shapeless and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: indistinct forms of mountains with which it seemed to be surrounded. The
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: cool and yet mild air of the summer night refreshed Waverley after
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: his rapid and toilsome walk; and the perfume which it wafted from the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: birch-trees, bathed in the evening dew, was exquisitely fragrant. [It is
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: not the weeping birch, the most common species in the Highlands, but the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: woolly-leaved Lowland birch, that is distinguished by this fragrance.]
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: He had now time to give himself up to the full romance of his situation.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Here he saw on the banks of an unknown lake, under the guidance of a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: wild native, whose language was unknown to him, on a visit to the den of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: some renowned outlaw, a second Robin Hood, perhaps, or Adam o' Gordon,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and that at deep midnight, through scenes of difficulty and toil,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: separated from his attendant, left by his guide.--What a variety of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: incidents for the exercise of a romantic imagination, and all enhanced
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: by the solemn feeling of uncertainty, at least, if not of danger! The
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: only circumstance which assorted ill with the rest, was the cause of his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: journey--the Baron's milk-cows! This degrading incident he kept in the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: background.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: While wrapped in these dreams of imagination, his companion gently
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: touched him, and pointing in a direction nearly straight across the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: lake, said 'Yon's ta cove.' A small point of light was seen to twinkle
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: in the direction in which he pointed, and gradually increasing in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: size and lustre, seemed to flicker like a meteor upon the verge of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: horizon. While Edward watched this phenomenon, the distant dash of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: oars was heard. The measured sound approached near and more near, and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: with the battle-axe immediately whistled clear and shrill, in reply to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: a little inlet, near which Edward was sitting. He advanced to meet
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: them with his attendant, was immediately assisted into the boat by the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: officious attention of two stout mountaineers, and had no sooner seated
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: with great rapidity.

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: person and low in stature, with light sandy-coloured hair, and small

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: to make a very general reply.

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'No--he that steals a cow from a poor widow, or a stirk from a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: cottar, is a thief; he that lifts a drove from a Sassenach laird, is a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: gentleman-drover. And, besides, to take a tree from the forest, a salmon
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: from the river, a deer from the hill, or a cow from a Lowland strath, is
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: what no Highlander need ever think shame upon.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'But what can this end in, were he taken in such an appropriation?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'To be sure he would DIE FOR THE LAW, as many a pretty man has done
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: before him.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Die for the law!'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Aye; that is, with the law, or by the law; be strapped up on the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: KIND gallows of Crieff, [12] where his father died, and his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: goodsire died, and where I hope he'll live to die himself, if he's not
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: shot, or slashed, in a creagh.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'You HOPE such a death for your friend, Evan!'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'And that do I e'en; would you have me wish him to die on a bundle of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: wet straw in yon den of his, like a mangy tyke?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'But what becomes of Alice, then?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Troth, if such an accident were to happen, as her father would not need
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: her help ony langer, I ken naught to hinder me to marry her mysell.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Gallantly resolved!' said Edward;--'but, in the meanwhile, Evan, what
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: has your father-in-law (that shall be, if he have the good fortune to be
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: hanged) done with the Baron's cattle?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Oich,' answered Evan, 'they were all trudging before your lad and Allan
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Kennedy before the sun blinked ower Ben-Lawers this morning; and they'll
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: be in the pass of Bally-Brough by this time, in their way back to the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: parks of Tully-Veolan, all but two, that were unhappily slaughtered
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: before I got last night to Uaimh an Ri.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'And where are we going, Evan, if I may be so bold as to ask?' said
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Waverley.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Where would you be ganging, but to the laird's ain house of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Glennaquoich? Ye would not think to be in his country, without ganging
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to see him? It would be as much as a man's life's worth,'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'And are we far from Glennaquoich?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: But five bits of miles; and Vich Ian Vohr will meet us.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: In about half an hour they reached the upper end of the lake, where,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: after landing Waverley, the two Highlanders drew the boat into a little
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: creek among thick flags and reeds, where it lay perfectly concealed.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The oars they put in another place of concealment, both for the use of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Donald Bean Lean probably, when his occasions should next bring him to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: that place.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The travellers followed for some time a delightful opening into the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: hills, down which a little brook found its way to the lake. When they
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: had pursued their walk a short distance, Waverley renewed his questions
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: about their host of the cavern.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Does he always reside in that cave?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Out, no! it's past the skill of man to tell where he's to be found
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: at a' times; there's not a dern nook, or cove, or corri, in the whole
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: country, that he's not acquainted with.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'And do others beside your master shelter him?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'My master?--My master is in heaven,' answered Evan haughtily; and then
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: immediately assuming his usual civility of manner--'But you mean my
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Chief;--no, he does not shelter Donald Bean Lean, nor any that are like
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: him; he only allows him (with a smile) wood and water.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'No great boon, I should think, Evan, when both seem to be very plenty.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Ah! but ye dinna see through it. When I say wood and water, I mean the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: loch and the land; and I fancy Donald would be put till't if the laird
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: were to look for him wi' threescore men in the wood of Kailychat yonder;
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and if our boats, with a score or twa mair, were to come down the loch
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to Uaimh an Ri, headed by mysell, or ony other pretty man.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'But suppose a strong party came against him from the Low Country, would
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: not your Chief defend him?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Na, he would not ware the spark of a flint for him--if they came with
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the law.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'And what must Donald do, then?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'He behoved to rid this country of himsell, and fall back, it may be,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: over the mount upon Letter Scriven.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'And if he were pursued to that place?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'I'se warrant he would go to his cousin's at Rannoch.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Well, but if they followed him to Rannoch?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'That,' quoth Evan, 'is beyond all belief; and, indeed, to tell you the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: truth, there durst not a Lowlander in all Scotland follow the fray a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: gun-shot beyond Bally-Brough, unless he had the help of the SIDIER DHU.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Whom do you call so?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'The SIDIER DHU? the black soldier; that is what they call the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: independent companies that were raised to keep peace and law in the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Highlands. Vich Ian Vohr commanded one of them for five years, and I was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: sergeant myself, I shall warrant ye. They call them SIDIER DHU, because
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: they wear the tartans,--as they call your men, King George's men, SIDIER
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: ROY, or red soldiers.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Well, but when you were in King George's pay, Evan, you were surely
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: King George's soldiers?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Troth, and you must ask Vich Ian Vohr about that; for we are for his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: king, and care not much which o' them it is. At any rate, nobody can
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: say we are King George's men now, when we have not seen his pay this
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: twelvemonth.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: This last argument admitted of no reply, nor did Edward attempt any;
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: he rather chose to bring back the discourse to Donald Bean Lean. 'Does
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Donald confine himself to cattle, or does he LIFT, as you call it,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: anything else that comes in his way?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Troth, he's nae nice body, and he'll just tak ony thing, but most
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: readily cattle, horse, or live Christians; for sheep are slow of travel,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and inside plenishing is cumbrous to carry, and not easy to put away for
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: siller in this country.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'But does he carry off men and women?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Out, aye. Did not ye hear him speak o' the Perth bailie? It cost that
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: body five hundred merks ere he got to the south of Bally-Brough.--And
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: ance Donald played a pretty sport. [13] There was to be a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: blythe bridal between the Lady Cramfeezer, in the howe o' the Mearns
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: (she was the auld laird's widow, and no sae young as she had been
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: hersell), and young Gilliewhackit, who had spent his heirship and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: movables, like a gentleman, at cock-matches, bull-baitings, horse-races,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and the like. Now, Donald Bean Lean, being aware that the bridegroom
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was in request, and wanting to cleik the cunzie (that is, to hook the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: siller), he cannily carried off Gilliewhackit ae night when he was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: riding DOVERING hame (wi' the malt rather abune the meal), and with the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: help of his gillies he gat him into the hills with the speed of light,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and the first place he wakened in was the cove of Uaimh an Ri. So there
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was old to do about ransoming the bridegroom; for Donald would not lower
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: a farthing of a thousand punds'--
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The devil!'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Punds Scottish, ya shall understand. And the lady had not the siller
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: if she had pawned her gown; and they applied to the governor o' Stirling
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: castle, and to the major o' the Black Watch; and the governor said, it
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was ower far to the northward, and out of his district; and the major
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: said, his men were gane hame to the shearing, and he would not call
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: them out before the victual was got in for all the Cramfeezers in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Christendom, let alane the Mearns, for that it would prejudice the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: country. And in the meanwhile ye'll no hinder Gilliewhackit to take the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: small-pox. There was not the doctor in Perth or Stirling would look near
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the poor lad; and I cannot blame them, for Donald had been misguggled by
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: ane of these doctors about Paris, and he swore he would fling the first
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: into the loch that he catched beyond the Pass. However, some cailliachs
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: (that is, old women) that were about Donald's hand, nursed Gilliewhackit
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: sae weel, that between the free open air in the cove and the fresh whey,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: deil an' he did not recover maybe as weel as if he had been closed in a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: glazed chamber and a bed with curtains, and fed with red wine and white
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: meat. And Donald was sae vexed about it, that when he was stout and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: weel, he even sent him free home, and said he would be pleased with
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: onything they would like to gie him for the plague and trouble which
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: he had about Gilliewhackit to an unkenn'd degree. And I cannot tell you
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: precisely how they sorted; but they agreed sae right that Donald was

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: that there was never sae meikle siller clinked in his purse either
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: before or since. And to the boot of all that, Gilliewhackit said, that,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: be the evidence what it liked, if he had the luck to be on Donald's

author: Scott, Walter

text: inquest, he would bring him in guilty of nothing whatever, unless it

author: Scott, Walter

text: were wilful arson, or murder under trust.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: With such bald and disjointed chat Evan went on, illustrating the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: existing state of the Highlands, more perhaps to the amusement of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Waverley than that of our readers. At length, after having marched over
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: bank and brae, moss and heather, Edward, though not unacquainted with
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the Scottish liberality in computing distance, began to think that
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Evan's five miles were nearly doubled. His observation on the large
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: measure which the Scottish allowed of their land, in comparison to the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: computation of their money, was readily answered by Evan, with the old
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: jest, The deil take them wha have the least pint stoup.' ['The Scotch
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: are liberal in computing their land and liquor; the Scottish pint
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: corresponds to two English quarts. As for their coin, every one knows
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the couplet--
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'How can the rogues pretend to sense?
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Their pound is only twenty pence.']
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: And now the report of a gun was heard, and a sportsman was seen, with
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: his dogs and attendant, at the upper end of the glen. 'Shough,' said
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Dugald Mahony, 'tat's ta Chief.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'It is not,' said Evan imperiously. 'Do you think he would come to meet
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: a Sassenach Duinhe-wassel in such a way as that?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: But as they approached a little nearer, he said, with an appearance of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: mortification, 'And it is even he, sure enough; and he has not his tail
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: on after all;--there is no living creature with him but Callum Beg.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: In fact, Fergus Mac-Ivor, of whom a Frenchman might have said, as truly
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: as of any man in the Highlands, 'QU'IL CONNOIT BIEN SES GENS,' had no
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: idea of raising himself in the eyes of an English young man of fortune,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: by appearing with a retinue of idle Highlanders disproportioned to the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: occasion. He was well aware that such an unnecessary attendance would
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: seem to Edward rather ludicrous than respectable; and while few men were
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: more attached to ideas of chieftainship and feudal power, he was, for
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: that very reason, cautious of exhibiting external marks of dignity,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: unless at the time and in the manner when they were most likely to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: produce an imposing effect. Therefore, although, had he been to receive
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: a brother chieftain, he would probably have been attended by all that
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: retinue which Evan described with so much unction, he judged it more

author: Scott, Walter

text: respectable to advance to meet Waverley with a single attendant, a very
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: handsome Highland boy, who carried his master's shooting-pouch and his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: broadsword, without which he seldom went abroad.

author: Scott, Walter

text: When Fergus and Waverley met, the latter was struck with the peculiar
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: grace and dignity of the Chieftain's figure, Above the middle size, and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: mode, set off his person to great advantage. He wore the trews, or
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: extremely handsome. The martial air of the bonnet, with a single eagle's

author: Scott, Walter

text: feather as a distinction, added much to the manly appearance of his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: head, which was besides ornamented with a far more natural and graceful
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: cluster of close black curls than ever were exposed to sale in Bond
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Street.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: An air of openness and affability increased the favourable impression
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: derived from this handsome and dignified exterior. Yet a skilful
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: physiognomist would have been less satisfied with the countenance on
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the second than on the first view. The eyebrow and upper lip bespoke
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: something of the habit of peremptory command and decisive superiority.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Even his courtesy, though open, frank, and unconstrained, seemed
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to indicate a sense of personal importance; and, upon any check or
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: accidental excitation, a sudden, though transient lour of the eye,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: showed a hasty, haughty, and vindictive temper, not less to be dreaded
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: because it seemed much under its owner's command. In short, the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: countenance of the Chieftain resembled a smiling summer's day, in which,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: notwithstanding, we are made sensible by certain, though slight signs,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: that it may thunder and lighten before the close of evening.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: It was not, however, upon their first meeting that Edward had an
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: opportunity of making these less favourable remarks. The Chief received
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: him as a friend of the Baron of Bradwardine, with the utmost expression
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of kindness and obligation for the visit; upbraided him gently with
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: choosing so rude an abode as he had done the night before; and entered
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: into a lively conversation with him about Donald Bean's housekeeping,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: but without the least hint as to his predatory habits, or the immediate
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: occasion of Waverley's visit, a topic which, as the Chief did not
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: introduce it, our hero also avoided. While they walked merrily on
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: towards the house of Glennaquoich, Evan, who now fell respectfully into
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the rear, followed with Callum Beg and Dugald Mahony.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: We shall take the opportunity to introduce the reader to some
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: particulars of Fergus Mac-Ivor's character and history, which were
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: not completely known to Waverley till after a connexion, which, though
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: arising from a circumstance so casual, had for a length of time the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: deepest influence upon his character, actions, and prospects. But this,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: being an important subject, must form the commencement of a new chapter.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

text: CHAPTER XIX
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: THE CHIEF AND HIS MANSION
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The ingenious licentiate, Francisco de Ubeda, when he commenced his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: history of La Picara Justina Diez,--which, by the way, is one of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: most rare books of Spanish literature,--complained of his pen having
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: caught up a hair, and forthwith begins, with more eloquence than
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: common sense, an affectionate expostulation with that useful implement,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: upbraiding it with being the quill of a goose,--a bird inconstant by
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: nature, as frequenting the three elements of water, earth, and air,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: indifferently, and being, of course, 'to one thing constant never.' Now
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: I protest to thee, gentle reader, that I entirely dissent from Francisco
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: de Ubeda in this matter, and hold it the most useful quality of my pen,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: that it can speedily change from grave to gay, and from description and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: dialogue to narrative and character. So that, if my quill display no
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: other properties of its mother-goose than her mutability, truly I shall
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: be well pleased; and I conceive that you, my worthy friend, will have
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: no occasion for discontent. From the jargon, therefore, of the Highland
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: gillies, I pass to the character of their Chief. It is an important
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: examination, and therefore, like Dogberry, we must spare no wisdom.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The ancestor of Fergus Mac-Ivor, about three centuries before, had set
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: up a claim to be recognized as chief of the numerous and powerful clan
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to which he belonged, the name of which it is unnecessary to mention.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Being defeated by an opponent who had more justice, or at least more
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: force, on his side, he moved southwards, with those who adhered to him,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: in quest of new settlements, like a second Aeneas. The state of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Perthshire Highlands favoured his purpose. A great baron in that country
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: had lately become traitor to the crown; Ian, which was the name of our
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: adventurer, united himself with those who were commissioned by the king
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to chastise him, and did such good service, that he obtained a grant
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of the property, upon which he and his posterity afterwards resided. He
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: followed the king also in war to the fertile regions of England, where
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: he employed his leisure hours so actively in raising subsidies among the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: boors of Northumberland and Durham, that upon his return he was enabled
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to erect a stone tower, or fortalice, so much admired by his dependants
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and neighbours, that he, who had hitherto been called Ian Mac-Ivor, or
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: John the son of Ivor, was thereafter distinguished, both in song and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: genealogy, by the high title of IAN NAN CHAISTEL, or John of the Tower.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The descendants of this worthy were so proud of him, that the reigning
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: chief always bore the patronymic title of Vich Ian Vohr, i.e. the son of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: John the Great; while the clan at large, to distinguish them from that
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: from which they had seceded, were denominated SLIOCHD NAN IVOR, the race
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of Ivor.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The father of Fergus, the tenth in direct descent from John of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Tower, engaged heart and hand in the insurrection of 1715, and was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: forced to fly to France, after the attempt of that year in favour of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Stuarts had proved unsuccessful. More fortunate than other fugitives, he
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: obtained employment in the French service, and married a lady of rank in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: that kingdom, by whom he had two children, Fergus and his sister Flora.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The Scottish estate had been forfeited and exposed to sale, but was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: re-purchased for a small price in the name of the young proprietor, who
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: in consequence came to reside upon his native domains. [14] It
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was soon perceived that he possessed a character of uncommon acuteness,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: fire, and ambition, which, as he became acquainted with the state of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: country, gradually assumed a mixed and peculiar tone, that could only
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: have been acquired Sixty Years since.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Had Fergus Mac-Ivor lived Sixty Years sooner than he did, he would, in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: all probability, have wanted the polished manner and knowledge of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: world which he now possessed; and had he lived Sixty Years later, his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: ambition and love of rule would have lacked the fuel which his situation
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: now afforded. He was indeed, within his little circle, as perfect a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: politician as Castruccio Castracani himself. He applied himself with
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: great earnestness to appease all the feuds and dissensions which often
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: arose among other clans in his neighbourhood, so that he became
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: a frequent umpire in their quarrels. His own patriarchal power he
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: strengthened at every expense which his fortune would permit, and indeed
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: stretched his means to the uttermost, to maintain the rude and plentiful
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: hospitality, which was the most valued attribute of a chieftain. For the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: same reason, he crowded his estate with a tenantry, hardy indeed, and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: fit for the purposes of war, but greatly outnumbering what the soil was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: calculated to maintain. These consisted chiefly of his own clan, not one
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of whom he suffered to quit his lands if he could possibly prevent it.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: But he maintained, besides, many adventurers from the mother sept, who
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: deserted a less warlike, though more wealthy chief, to do homage to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Fergus Mac-Ivor. Other individuals, too, who had not even that apology,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: were nevertheless received into his allegiance, which indeed was refused
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to none who were, like Poins, proper men of their hands, and were
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: willing to assume the name of Mac-Ivor.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: He was enabled to discipline these forces, from having obtained command
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of one of the independent companies raised by Government to preserve the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: peace of the Highlands. While in this capacity he acted with vigour and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: spirit, and preserved great order in the country under his charge. He
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: caused his vassals to enter by rotation into his company, and serve for
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: a certain space of time, which gave them all in turn a general notion
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of military discipline. In his campaigns against the banditti, it was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: observed that he assumed and exercised to the utmost the discretionary
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: power, which, while the law had no free course in the Highlands, was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: conceived to belong to the military parties who were called in to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: support it. He acted, for example, with great and suspicious lenity
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to those freebooters who made restitution on his summons, and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: offered personal submission to himself, while he rigorously pursued,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: apprehended, and sacrificed to justice, all such interlopers as dared to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: despise his admonitions or commands. On the other hand, if any officers
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of justice, military parties, or others, presumed to pursue thieves or
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: marauders through his territories, and without applying for his consent
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and concurrence, nothing was more certain than that they would meet with
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: some notable foil or defeat; upon which occasions Fergus Mac-Ivor
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was the first to condole with them, and, after gently blaming their
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: rashness, never failed deeply to lament the lawless state of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: country. These lamentations did not exclude suspicion, and matters were
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: so represented to Government, that our Chieftain was deprived of his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: military command. [15]
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Whatever Fergus Mac-Ivor felt on this occasion, he had the art of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: entirely suppressing every appearance of discontent; but in a short time
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the neighbouring country began to feel bad effects from his disgrace.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Donald Bean Lean, and others of his class, whose depredations had
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: hitherto been confined to other districts, appeared from thenceforward
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to have made a settlement on this devoted border; and their ravages were
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: carried on with little opposition, as the Lowland gentry were chiefly
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Jacobites, and disarmed. This forced many of the inhabitants into
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: contracts of blackmail with Fergus Mac-Ivor, which not only
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: established him their protector, and gave him great weight in all their
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: consultations, but, moreover, supplied funds for the waste of his feudal
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: hospitality, which the discontinuance of his pay might have otherwise
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: essentially diminished.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: In following this course of conduct, Fergus had a further object than
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: merely being the great man of his neighbourhood, and ruling despotically
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: over a small clan. From his infancy upward, he had devoted himself to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the cause of the exiled family, and had persuaded himself, not only
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: that their restoration to the crown of Britain would be speedy, but that
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: those who assisted them would be raised to honour and rank. It was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: with this view that he laboured to reconcile the Highlanders among
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: themselves, and augmented his own force to the utmost, to be prepared
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: for the first favourable opportunity of rising. With this purpose also
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: he conciliated the favour of such Lowland gentlemen in the vicinity
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: as were friends to the good cause; and for the same reason, having
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: incautiously quarrelled with Mr. Bradwardine, who, notwithstanding his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: peculiarities, was much respected in the country, he took advantage of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the foray of Donald Bean Lean to solder up the dispute in the manner we
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: have mentioned. Some, indeed, surmised that he caused the enterprise to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: be suggested to Donald, on purpose to pave the way to a reconciliation,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: which, supposing that to be the case, cost the Laird of Bradwardine two
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: good milch-cows. This zeal in their behalf the House of Stuart repaid
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: with a considerable share of their confidence, an occasional supply of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: louis d'or, abundance of fair words, and a parchment, with a huge waxen
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: seal appended, purporting to be an Earl's patent, granted by no less
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: a person than James the Third King of England, and Eighth King of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Scotland, to his right leal, trusty, and well-beloved Fergus Mac-Ivor of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Glennaquoich, in the county of Perth, and kingdom of Scotland.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: With this future coronet glittering before his eyes, Fergus plunged
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: deeply into the correspondence and plots of that unhappy period; and,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: like all such active agents, easily reconciled his conscience to going
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: certain lengths in the service of his party, from which honour and pride
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: would have deterred him, had his sole object been the direct advancement
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of his own personal interest. With this insight into a bold, ambitious,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and ardent, yet artful and politic character, we resume the broken
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: thread of our narrative.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The Chief and his guest had by this time reached the house of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Glennaquoich, which consisted of Ian nan Chaistel's mansion, a high
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: rude-looking square tower, with the addition of a lofted house, that is,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: a building of two stories, constructed by Fergus's grandfather when he
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: returned from that memorable expedition, well remembered by the western
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: shires under the name of the Highland Host. Upon occasion of this
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: crusade against the Ayrshire Whigs and Covenanters, the Vich Ian Vohr
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of the time had probably been as successful as his predecessor was in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: harrying Northumberland, and therefore left to his posterity a rival
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: edifice, as a monument of his magnificence.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Around the house, which stood on an eminence in the midst of a narrow
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Highland valley, there appeared none of that attention to convenience,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: far less to ornament and decoration, which usually surrounds a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: gentleman's habitation. An enclosure or two, divided by dry-stone walls,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: were the only part of the domain that was fenced; as to the rest,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the narrow slips of level ground which lay by the side of the brook
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: exhibited a scanty crop of barley, liable to constant depredations from

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

text: have changed the domain for Stowe or Blenheim.

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: in the domain assigned to him by the gratitude of his country. This
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: at sight of whom the Chieftain apologized to Waverley in a sort of

text: negligent manner. 'He had forgot,' he said, 'that he had ordered a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

text: a part of their exercise.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Edward assented, and the men executed with agility and precision some of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the ordinary military movements. They then practised individually at a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: mark, and showed extraordinary dexterity in the management of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: pistol and firelock. They took aim, standing, sitting, leaning, or
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: lying prostrate, as they were commanded, and always with effect upon the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: target. Next, they paired off for the broadsword exercise; and, having
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: manifested their individual skill and dexterity, united in two bodies,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and exhibited a sort of mock encounter, in which the charge, the rally,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the flight, the pursuit, and all the current of a heady fight, were
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: exhibited to the sound of the great war-bagpipe.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: On a signal made by the Chief, the skirmish was ended. Marches were
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: then made for running, wrestling, leaping, pitching the bar, and other
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: sports, in which this feudal militia displayed incredible swiftness,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: strength, and agility; and accomplished the purpose which their
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Chieftain had at heart, by impressing on Waverley no light sense of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: their merit as soldiers, and of the power of him who commanded them by
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: his nod. [16]
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'And what number of such gallant fellows have the happiness to call you
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: leader?' asked Waverley.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'In a good cause, and under a chieftain whom they loved, the race of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Ivor have seldom taken the field under five hundred claymores. But you
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: are aware, Captain Waverley, that the Disarming Act, passed about twenty
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: years ago, prevents their being in the complete state of preparation
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: as in former times; and I keep no more of my clan under arms than may
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: defend my own or my friends' property, when the country is troubled
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: with such men as your last night's landlord; and Government, which
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: has removed other means of defence, must connive at our protecting
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: ourselves.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'But, with your force, you might soon destroy, or put down, such gangs
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: as that of Donald Bean Lean.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Yes, doubtless; and my reward would be a summons to deliver up to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: General Blakeney, at Stirling, the few broadswords they have left us:
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: there were little policy in that, methinks.--But come, Captain, the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: sound of the pipes informs me that dinner is prepared. Let me have the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: honour to show you into my rude mansion.'
