title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: erroneously, that the liberty and rights of the subject were less
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: carefully protected. A sentiment of bitterness rose in his mind against
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the Government, which he considered as the cause of his embarrassment
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and peril, and he cursed internally his scrupulous rejection of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Mac-Ivor's invitation to accompany him to the field.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Why did not I,' he said to himself, 'like other men of honour, take the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: earliest opportunity to welcome to Britain the descendant of her ancient
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: kings, and lineal heir of her throne? Why did not I
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Unthread the rude eye of rebellion,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: And welcome home again discarded faith,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Seek out Prince Charles, and fall before his feet?
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: All that has been recorded of excellence and worth in the house of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Waverley has been founded upon their loyal faith to the house of Stuart.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: From the interpretation which this Scotch magistrate has put upon
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the letters of my uncle and father, it is plain that I ought to have
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: understood them as marshalling me to the course of my ancestors; and it
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: has been my gross dullness, joined to the obscurity of expression which
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: they adopted for the sake of security, that has confounded my judgement.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Had I yielded to the first generous impulse of indignation when I
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: learned that my honour was practised upon, how different had been my
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: present situation! I had then been free and in arms, fighting, like my
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: forefathers, for love, for loyalty, and for fame. And now I am here,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: netted and in the toils, at the disposal of a suspicious, stern,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and cold-hearted man, perhaps to be turned over to the solitude of a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: dungeon, or the infamy of a public execution. O Fergus! how true has
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: your prophecy proved; and how speedy, how very speedy, has been its
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: accomplishment!'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: While Edward was ruminating on these painful subjects of contemplation,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and very naturally, though not quite so justly, bestowing upon the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: reigning dynasty that blame which was due to chance, or, in part at
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Major Melville's permission to pay him an early visit.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Waverley's first impulse was to intimate a desire that he might not
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: be disturbed with questions or conversation; but he suppressed it upon
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: observing the benevolent and reverend appearance of the clergyman who
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: had rescued him from the immediate violence of the villagers.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'I believe, sir,' said the unfortunate young man, 'that in any other
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: circumstances I should have had as much gratitude to express to you as
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the safety of my life may be worth; but such is the present tumult of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: my mind, and such is my anticipation of what I am yet likely to endure,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: that I can hardly offer you thanks for your interposition.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Mr. Morton replied, that, far from making any claim upon his good
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: opinion, his only wish and the sole purpose of his visit was to find
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: out the means of deserving it. 'My excellent friend, Major Melville,' he
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: continued, 'has feelings and duties as a soldier and public functionary,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: by which I am not fettered; nor can I always coincide in opinions which
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: he forms, perhaps with too little allowance for the imperfections of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: human nature. He paused, and then proceeded: 'I do not intrude myself
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: on your confidence, Mr. Waverley, for the purpose of learning any
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: circumstances, the knowledge of which can be prejudicial either to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: yourself or to others; but I own my earnest wish is, that you would
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: can solemnly assure you they will be deposited with a faithful, and, to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the extent of his limited powers, a zealous agent.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'You are, sir, I presume, a Presbyterian clergyman?'--Mr. Morton
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: bowed.--'Were I to be guided by the prepossessions of education, I might
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: distrust your friendly professions in my case; but I have observed
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: that similar prejudices are nourished in this country against your
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: professional brethren of the Episcopal persuasion, and I am willing to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: believe them equally unfounded in both cases.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Evil to him that thinks otherwise,' said Mr. Morton; 'or who holds
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: church government and ceremonies as the exclusive gage of Christian
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: faith or moral virtue.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'But,' continued Waverley, 'I cannot perceive why I should trouble you
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: with a detail of particulars, out of which, after revolving them as
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: carefully as possible in my recollection, I find myself unable to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: explain much of what is charged against me. I know, indeed, that I am
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: innocent, but I hardly see how I can hope to prove myself so.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'It is for that very reason, Mr. Waverley,' said the clergyman, 'that I
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: venture to solicit your confidence. My knowledge of individuals in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: this country is pretty general, and can upon occasion be extended.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Your situation will, I fear, preclude you taking those active steps for
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: recovering intelligence, or tracing imposture, which I would willingly
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: undertake in your behalf; and if you are not benefited by my exertions,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: at least they cannot be prejudicial to you.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the earnestness of his expression, be of some service to himself. He
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: is already acquainted, suppressing his attachment to Flora, and indeed

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: narrative.

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: visit to Donald Bean Lean. 'I am glad,' he said, 'you did not mention
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: this circumstance to the Major. It is capable of great misconstruction
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: on the part; of those who do not consider the power of curiosity and the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: influence of romance as motives of youthful conduct. When I was a young
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: man like you, Mr. Waverley, any such hair-brained expedition (I beg your
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: pardon for the expression) would have had inexpressible charms for me.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: and fatigue are often incurred without any very adequate cause, and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

text: foreign to the truth. This man Bean Lean is renowned through the country

text: probably attempt, by every means, to distinguish himself during the

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: for your sake, for the governor is a man of honour and humanity. But

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: calculating Scotch magistrate. I hope he and I shall never meet more:

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: I am.'

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: A VOLUNTEER SIXTY YEARS SINCE
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: On hearing the unwelcome sound of the drum, Major Melville hastily
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: opened a sashed door, and stepped out upon a sort of terrace which
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: divided his house from the high-road from which the martial music
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: proceeded. Waverley and his new friend followed him, though probably
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: he would have dispensed with their attendance. They soon recognized in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: solemn march, first, the performer upon the drum; secondly, a large
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: flag of four compartments, on which were inscribed the words COVENANTS,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: RELIGION, KING, KINGDOMES. The person who was honoured with this charge
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was followed by the commander of the party, a thin, dark, rigid-looking
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: man, about sixty years old. The spiritual pride, which in mine Host of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the Candlestick mantled in a sort of supercilious hypocrisy, was, in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: this man's face, elevated and yet darkened by genuine and undoubting
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: fanaticism. It was impossible to behold him without imagination
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: placing him in some strange crisis, where religious zeal was the ruling
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: principle. A martyr at the stake, a soldier in the field, a lonely and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: banished wanderer consoled by the intensity and supposed purity of his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: faith under every earthly privation; perhaps a persecuting inquisitor,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: as terrible in power as unyielding in adversity; any of these seemed
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: congenial characters to this personage. With these high traits of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: energy, there was something in the affected precision and solemnity of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: his deportment and discourse, that bordered upon the ludicrous; so that,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: according to the mood of the spectator's mind, and the light under which
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Mr. Gilfillan presented himself, one might have feared; admired, or
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: laughed at him. His dress was that of a west-country peasant, of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: better materials indeed than that of the lower rank, but in no respect
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: affecting either the mode of the age, or of the Scottish gentry at
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: any period. His arms were a broadsword and pistols, which, from the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: antiquity of their appearance, might have seen the rout of Pentland, or
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Bothwell Brigg.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: As he came up a few steps to meet Major Melville, and touched solemnly,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: but slightly, his huge and overbrimmed blue bonnet, in answer to the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Major, who had courteously raised a small triangular gold-laced hat,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Waverley was irresistibly impressed with the idea that he beheld a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: leader of the Roundheads of yore in conference with one of Marlborough's
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: captains.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The group of about thirty armed men who followed this gifted commander,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was of a motley description. They were in ordinary Lowland dresses, of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: different colours, which, contrasted with the arms they bore, gave them
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: connect uniformity of dress with the military character. In front were
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: a few who apparently partook of their leader's enthusiasm; men obviously
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to be feared in a combat where their natural courage was exalted by
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: religious zeal. Others puffed and strutted, filled with the importance
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of carrying arms, and all the novelty of their situation, while
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: listlessly along, or straggled from their companions to procure such
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: refreshments as the neighbouring cottages and ale-houses afforded.--Six
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: grenadiers of Ligonier's, thought the Major to himself, as his mind
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: reverted to his own military experience, would have sent all these
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: fellows to the right about.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Greeting, however, Mr. Gilfillan civilly, he requested to know if he
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: had received the letter he had sent to him upon his march, and could
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: undertake the charge of the state prisoner whom he there mentioned, as
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: far as Stirling Castle. 'Yea,' was the concise reply of the Cameronian
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: leader, in a voice which seemed to issue from the very PENETRALIA of his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: person.

author: Scott, Walter

text: 'But your escort, Mr. Gilfillan, is not so strong as I expected,' said
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Major Melville,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Some of the people,' replied Gilfillan, 'hungered and were athirst
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: by the way, and tarried until their poor souls were refreshed with the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: word.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'I am sorry, sir,' replied the Major, 'you did not trust to your
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: refreshing your men at Cairnvreckan; whatever my house contains is at
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the command of persons employed in the service.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'It was not of creature comforts I spake,' answered the Covenanter,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: regarding Major Melville with something like a smile of contempt;
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'howbeit, I thank you; but the people remained waiting upon the precious
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Mr. Jabesh Rentowel, for the outpouring of the afternoon exhortation.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'And have you, sir,' said the Major, 'when the rebels are about to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: spread themselves through this country, actually left a great part of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: your command at a field-preaching!'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Gilfillan again smiled scornfully as he made this indirect
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: answer,--'Even thus are the children of this world wiser in their
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: generation than the children of light!'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'However, sir,' said the Major, 'as you are to take charge of this
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: gentleman to Stirling, and deliver him, with these papers, into the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: hands of Governor Blakeney, I beseech you to observe some rules of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: military discipline upon your march. For example, I would advise you to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: keep your men more closely together, and that each, in his march, should
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: cover his file-leader, instead of straggling like geese upon a common;
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: advance-party of your best men, with a single vidette in front of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: whole march, so that when you approach a village or a wood'--(Here the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: upon the subject. You are a better judge, unquestionably, than I am, of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of, that you are to treat this gentleman, your prisoner, with no rigour

author: Scott, Walter

text: nor incivility, and are to subject him to no other restraint than is

author: Scott, Walter

text: necessary for his security.'

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: beneath his neat military side-curls, the more so, as he observed Mr.

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: AN INCIDENT
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The dinner-hour of Scotland Sixty Years since was two o'clock. It was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: therefore about four o'clock of a delightful autumn afternoon that Mr.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Gilfillan commenced his march, in hopes, although Stirling was eighteen
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: miles distant, he might be able, by becoming a borrower of the night
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: for an hour or two, to reach it that evening. He therefore put forth his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

text: strength, and marched stoutly along at the head of his followers, eyeing

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: While musing upon the cause of this contradictory spirit in persons
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: couch. Of this, indeed, he had but a very indistinct recollection, but
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: desire to believe she was in his neighbourhood, guarding, like an angel

author: Scott, Walter

text: of mercy, the couch of his sickness, Waverley was compelled to conclude
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: that his conjecture was altogether improbable; since, to suppose she had
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the Low Country, now the seat of civil war, and to inhabit such a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: lurking-place as this, was a thing hardly to be imagined. Yet his heart
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: bounded as he sometimes could distinctly hear the trip of a light female
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: step glide to or from the door of the hut, or the suppressed sounds of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: a female voice, of softness and delicacy, hold dialogue with the hoarse
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: was denominated.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Having nothing else to amuse his solitude, he employed himself in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: contriving some plan to gratify his curiosity, in spite of the sedulous
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: caution of Janet and the old Highland janizary, for he had never seen
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the young fellow since the first morning. At length, upon accurate
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: examination, the infirm state of his wooden prison-house appeared to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: supply the means of gratifying his curiosity, for out of a spot which
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was somewhat decayed he was able to extract a nail. Through this minute
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: aperture he could perceive a female form, wrapped in a plaid, in the act
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of conversing with Janet. But, since the days of our grandmother Eve,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the gratification of inordinate curiosity has generally borne its
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: penalty in disappointment. The form was not that of Flora, nor was the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: face visible; and, to crown his vexation, while he laboured with the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: nail to enlarge the hole, that he might obtain a more complete view,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: revisit the cottage.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: All precautions to blockade his view were from that time abandoned, and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: in a literal sense, his couch of confinement. But he was not allowed to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: leave the hut; for the young Highlander had now rejoined his senior, and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: one or other was constantly on the watch. Whenever Waverley approached
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the cottage door, the sentinel upon duty civilly, but resolutely, placed
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: himself against it and opposed his exit, accompanying his action with
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: signs which seemed to imply there was danger in the attempt, and an
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: enemy in the neighbourhood. Old Janet appeared anxious and upon the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: watch; and Waverley, who had not yet recovered strength enough to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: attempt to take his departure in spite of the opposition of his hosts,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was under the necessity of remaining patient. His fare was, in every
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: point of view, better than he could have conceived; for poultry,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and even wine, were no strangers to his table. The Highlanders never
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: presumed to eat with him, and unless in the circumstance of watching
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the window, or rather the shapeless aperture which was meant to answer
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the purpose of a window, upon large and rough brook, which raged and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: foamed through a rocky channel, closely canopied with trees and bushes,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: about ten feet beneath the site of his house of captivity.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Upon the sixth day of his confinement, Waverley found himself so well,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: that he began to meditate his escape from this dull and miserable
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: prison-house, thinking any risk which he might incur in the attempt
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: preferable to the stupefying and intolerable uniformity of Janet's
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: retirement. The question indeed occurred, whither he was to direct his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: course when again at his own disposal. Two schemes seemed practicable,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: yet both attended with danger and difficulty. One was to go back to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Glennaquoich, and join Fergus Mac-Ivor, by whom he was sure to be kindly
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: received; and in the present state of his mind, the rigour with which
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: he had been treated fully absolved him, in his own eyes, from his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: allegiance to the existing government. The other project was to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: endeavour to attain a Scottish seaport, and thence to take shipping for
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: England. His mind wavered between these plans; and probably, if he
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: had effected his escape in the manner he proposed, he would have been
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: finally determined by the comparative facility by which either might
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: have been executed. But his fortune had settled that he was not to be
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: left to his option.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Upon the evening of the seventh day the door of the hut suddenly opened,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and two Highlanders entered, whom Waverley recognized as having been a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: part of his original escort to this cottage. They conversed for a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: understand, by very significant signs, that he was to prepare to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: accompany them. This was a joyful communication. What had already passed
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: during his confinement made it evident that no personal injury was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: designed to him; and his romantic spirit, having recovered during
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: his repose much of that elasticity which anxiety, resentment,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: disappointment, and the mixture of unpleasant feelings excited by
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: his late adventures, had for a time subjugated, was now wearied with
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: inaction. His passion for the wonderful, although it is the nature of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: such dispositions to be excited, by that degree of danger which merely
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: gives dignity to the feeling of the individual exposed to it, had sunk
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: under the extraordinary and apparently, insurmountable evils by which
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: he appeared environed at Cairnvreckan. In fact, this compound of intense
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: curiosity and exalted imagination forms a peculiar species of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: courage, which somewhat resembles the light usually carried by a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: miner,--sufficiently competent, indeed, to afford him guidance and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: comfort during the ordinary perils of his labour, but certain to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: earth-damps or pestiferous vapours. It was now, however, once more
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: rekindled, and with a throbbing mixture of hope, awe, and anxiety,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Waverley watched the group before him, as those who had just arrived
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: snatched a hasty meal, and the others assumed their arms, and made brief
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: preparations for their departure.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: As he sat in the smoky hut, at some distance from the fire, around which
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the others were crowded, he felt a gentle pressure upon his arm. He
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: looked round--it was Alice, the daughter of Donald Bean Lean. She showed
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: him a packet of papers in such a manner that the motion was remarked by
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: no one else, put her finger for a second to her lips, and passed on, as
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: if to assist old Janet in packing Waverley's clothes in his portmanteau.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: It was obviously her wish that he should not seem to recognize her; yet
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: she repeatedly looked back at him, as an opportunity occurred of doing
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: so unobserved, and when she saw that he remarked what she did, she
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Here then was fresh food for conjecture. Was Alice his unknown warden,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: bed during his sickness? Was he in the hands of her father? and if
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: which might have tempted this professional plunderer, had been all along

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: tripped out from the door, that, favoured by the obscurity, she gave

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: The young Highlander was repeatedly dispatched by his comrades as if to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: collect intelligence. At length when he had returned for the third
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

text: who moved up the pathway in single or Indian file, Waverley being placed
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: nearest to their leader. He moved with great precaution, as if to avoid
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: giving any alarm, and halted as soon as he came to the verge of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: ascent. Waverley was soon sensible of the reason, for he heard at no
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: great distance an English sentinel call out 'All's well.' The heavy
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: sound sank on the night-wind down the woody glen, and was answered by
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the echoes of its banks. A second, third, and fourth time, the signal
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was repeated, fainter and fainter, as if at a greater and greater
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: distance. It was obvious that a party of soldiers were near, and upon
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: their guard, though not sufficiently so to detect men skilful in every
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: art of predatory warfare, like those with whom he now watched their
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: ineffectual precautions.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: When these sounds had died upon the silence of the night, the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Highlanders began their march swiftly, yet with the most cautious
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: silence. Waverley had little time, or indeed disposition, for
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: observation, and could only discern that; they passed at some distance
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: from a large building, in the windows of which a light or two yet seemed
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to twinkle. A little farther on, the leading Highlander snuffed the wind
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: like a setting spaniel, and then made a signal to his party again to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: halt. He stooped down upon all-fours, wrapped up in his plaid, so as to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: be scarce distinguishable from the heathy ground on which he moved, and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: advanced in this posture to reconnoitre. In a short time he returned,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and dismissed his attendants excepting one; and, intimating to Waverley
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: that he must imitate his cautious mode of proceeding, all three crept
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: forward on hands and knees.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: After proceeding a greater way in this inconvenient manner than was at
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: all comfortable to his knees and shins, Waverley perceived the smell
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of smoke, which probably had been much sooner distinguished by the more
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: acute nasal organs of his guide. It proceeded from the corner of a low
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and ruinous sheepfold, the walls of which were made of loose stones,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: as is usual in Scotland. Close by this low wall the Highlander guided
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Waverley, and, in order probably to make him sensible of his danger, or
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: perhaps to obtain the full credit of his own dexterity, he intimated
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to him, by sign and example, that he might raise his head so as to peep
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: into the sheepfold. Waverley did so, and beheld an outpost of four or
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: five soldiers lying by their watch-fire. They were all asleep, except
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the sentinel, who paced backwards and forwards with his firelock on his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: shoulder, which glanced red in the light of the fire as he crossed and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: recrossed before it in his short walk, casting his eye frequently to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: that part of the heavens from which the moon, hitherto obscured by mist,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: seemed now about to make her appearance,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: In the course of a minute or two, by one of those sudden changes of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: atmosphere incident to a mountainous country, a breeze arose, and swept
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: before it the clouds which had covered the horizon, and the night planet
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: poured her full effulgence upon a wide and blighted heath, skirted
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: indeed with copsewood and stunted trees in the quarter from which they
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: had come, but open and bare to the observation of the sentinel in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: that to which their course tended. The wall of the sheepfold, indeed,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: concealed them as they lay, but any advance beyond its shelter seemed
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: impossible without certain discovery.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The Highlander eyed the blue vault, but far from blessing the useful
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: light with Homer's, or rather Pope's, benighted peasant, he muttered a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Gaelic curse upon the unseasonable splendour of MAC-FARLANE'S BUAT
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: (i. e. lantern). [See Note 21.] He looked anxiously around for a few
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: minutes, and then apparently took his resolution. Leaving his attendant
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: with Waverley, after motioning to Edward to remain quiet, and giving
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: his comrade directions in a brief whisper, he retreated, favoured by the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: irregularity of the ground, in the same direction and in the same manner
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: as they had advanced. Edward, turning his head after him, could perceive
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: him crawling on all-fours with the dexterity of an Indian, availing
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: himself of every bush and inequality to escape observation, and never
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: passing over the more exposed parts of his track until the sentinel's
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: back was turned from him. At length he reached the thickets and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: underwood which partly covered the moor in that direction, and probably
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: extended to the verge of the glen where Waverley had been so long
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: an inhabitant. The Highlander disappeared, but it was only for a few
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: minutes, for he suddenly issued forth from a different part of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: thicket, and advancing boldly upon the open heath, as if to invite
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: discovery, he levelled his piece, and fired at the sentinel. A wound
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: in the arm proved a disagreeable interruption to the poor fellow's
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: meteorological observations, as well as to the tune of 'Nancy Dawson,'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: which he was whistling. He returned the fire ineffectually, and his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: comrades, starting up at the alarm, advanced alertly towards the spot
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: from which the first shot had issued. The Highlander, after giving them
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: a full view of his person, dived among the thickets, for his RUSE DE
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: GUERRE had now perfectly succeeded.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: While the soldiers pursued the cause of their disturbance in one
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: direction, Waverley, adopting the hint of his remaining attendant, made
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the best of his speed in that which his guide originally intended to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: pursue, and which now (the attention of the soldiers being drawn to a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: different quarter) was unobserved and unguarded. When they had run
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: about a quarter of a mile, the brow of a rising ground, which they had
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: surmounted, concealed them from further risk of observation. They
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: still heard, however, at a distance, the shouts of the soldiers as they
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: hallooed to each other upon the heath, and they could also hear the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: distant roll of a drum beating to arms in the same direction. But these
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: hostile sounds were now far in their rear, and died away upon the breeze
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: as they rapidly proceeded.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: When they had walked about half an hour, still along open and waste
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: ground of the same description, they came to the stump of an ancient
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: oak, which, from its relics, appeared to have been at one time a tree of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: very large size. In an adjacent hollow they found several Highlanders,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: with a horse or two. They had not joined them above a few minutes, which
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Waverley's attendant employed, in all probability, in communicating
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the cause of their delay (for the words 'Duncan Duroch' were often
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: repeated), when Duncan himself appeared, out of breath indeed, and with
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: all the symptoms of having run for his life, but laughing, and in high
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: spirits at the success of the stratagem by which he had baffled his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: pursuers. This, indeed, Waverley could easily conceive might be a matter
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of no great difficulty to the active mountaineer, who was perfectly
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: acquainted with the ground, and traced his course with a firmness and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: confidence to which his pursuers must have been strangers. The alarm
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: which he excited seemed still to continue, for a dropping shot or two
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: were heard at a great distance, which seemed to serve as an addition to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the mirth of Duncan and his comrades.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The mountaineer now resumed the arms with which he had entrusted our
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: hero, giving him to understand that the dangers of the journey were
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: happily surmounted. Waverley was then mounted upon one of the horses,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: a change which the fatigue of the night and his recent illness rendered
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: exceedingly acceptable. His portmanteau was placed on another
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: pony, Duncan mounted a third, and they set forward at a round pace,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: accompanied by their escort. No other incident marked the course of that
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: night's journey, and at the dawn of morning they attained the banks of a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: rapid river. The country around was at once fertile and romantic. Steep
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: banks of wood were broken by cornfields, which this year presented an
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: abundant harvest, already in a great measure cut down.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: On the opposite bank of the river, and partly surrounded by a winding of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: its stream, stood a large and massive castle, the half-ruined turrets
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of which were already glittering in the first rays of the sun. [See Note
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 22.] It was in form an oblong square, of size sufficient to contain a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: large court in the centre. The towers at each angle of the square rose
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: higher than the walls of the building, and were in their turn surmounted
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: by turrets, differing in height, and irregular in shape. Upon one of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: these a sentinel watched, whose bonnet and plaid, streaming in the wind,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: declared him to be a Highlander, as a broad white ensign, which
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: floated from another tower, announced that the garrison was held by the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: insurgent adherents of the House of Stuart.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Passing hastily through a small and mean town, where their appearance
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: excited neither surprise nor curiosity in the few peasants whom the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: labours of the harvest began to summon from their repose, the party
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: crossed an ancient and narrow bridge of several arches, and turning to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the left, up an avenue of huge old sycamores, Waverley found himself in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: front of the gloomy yet picturesque structure which he had admired at a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: distance. A huge iron-grated door, which formed the exterior defence
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of the gateway, was already thrown back to receive them; and a second,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: heavily constructed of oak, and studded thickly with iron nails, being
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: next opened, admitted them into the interior courtyard. A gentleman,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: dressed in the Highland garb, and having a white cockade in his bonnet,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: assisted Waverley to dismount from his horse, and with much courtesy bid
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: him welcome to the castle.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The governor for so we must term him, having conducted Waverley to a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: half-ruinous apartment, where, however, there was a small camp-bed, and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: having offered him any refreshment which he desired, was then about to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: leave him.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Will you not add to your civilities,' said Waverley, after having made
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the usual acknowledgement, 'by having the kindness to inform me where I
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: am, and whether or not I am to consider myself as a prisoner?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'I am not at liberty to be so explicit upon this subject as I could
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: wish. Briefly, however, you are in the Castle of Doune, in the district
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of Menteith, and in no danger whatever.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'And how am I assured of that?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'By the honour of Donald Stewart, governor of the garrison, and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: lieutenant-colonel in the service of his Royal Highness Prince Charles
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Edward.' So saying, he hastily left the apartment, as if to avoid
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: further discussion.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Exhausted by the fatigues of the night, our hero now threw himself upon
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the bed, and was in a few minutes fast asleep.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: CHAPTER XXXIX
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: THE JOURNEY IS CONTINUED
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Before Waverley awakened from his repose, the day was far advanced, and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: he began to feel that he had passed many hours without food. This was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: soon supplied in form of a copious breakfast, but Colonel Stewart, as
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: if wishing to avoid the queries of his guest, did not again present
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: himself. His compliments were, however, delivered by a servant, with an
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: offer to provide anything in his power that could be useful to Captain
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Waverley on his journey, which he intimated would be continued that
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: evening. To Waverley's further inquiries, the servant opposed the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: impenetrable barrier of real or affected ignorance and stupidity. He
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: removed the table and provisions, and Waverley was again consigned to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: his own meditations.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: As he contemplated the strangeness of his fortune, which seemed to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: delight in placing him at the disposal of others, without the power
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of directing his own motions, Edward's eye suddenly rested upon his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: portmanteau, which had been deposited in his apartment during his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: sleep. The mysterious appearance of Alice, in the cottage of the glen,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: immediately rushed upon his mind, and he was about to secure and examine
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the packet which she had deposited among his clothes, when the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: servant of Colonel Stewart again made his appearance, and took up the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: portmanteau upon his shoulders.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'May I not take out a change of linen, my friend?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Your honour sall get ane o' the Colonel's ain ruffled sarks, but this
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: maun gang in the baggage-cart.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: And so saying, he very coolly carried off the portmanteau, without
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: waiting further remonstrance, leaving our hero in a state where
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: disappointment and indignation struggled for the mastery. In a few
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: minutes he heard a cart rumble out of the rugged courtyard, and made
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: no doubt that he was now dispossessed, for a space at least, if not for
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: ever, of the only documents which seemed to promise some light upon
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the dubious events which had of late influenced his destiny. With
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: such melancholy thoughts he had to beguile about four or five hours of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: solitude.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: When this space was elapsed, the trampling of horse was heard in the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: courtyard, and Colonel Stewart soon after made his appearance to request
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: his guest to take some further refreshment before his departure. The
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: offer was accepted, for a late breakfast had by no means left our
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: hero incapable of doing honour to dinner, which was now presented. The
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: conversation of his host was that of a plain country gentleman, mixed
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

text: order, and moving steadily forward.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Marching in this manner they speedily reached an eminence, from which
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: they could view Edinburgh stretching along the ridgy hill which slopes
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: eastward from the Castle. The latter, being in a state of siege, or
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: rather of blockade, by the northern insurgents, who had already occupied
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of Highlanders as exposed themselves, either on the main street, or
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: elsewhere in the vicinity of the fortress. The morning being calm and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: fair, the effect of this dropping fire was to invest the Castle in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: wreaths of smoke, the edges of which dissipated slowly in the air, while
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the central veil was darkened ever and anon by fresh clouds poured forth
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: from the battlements; the whole giving, by the partial concealment, an
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: appearance of grandeur and gloom, rendered more terrific when Waverley
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Ere they approached the city, the partial cannonade had wholly ceased.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: had apparently no wish to tempt the forbearance of the artillery of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the southward, so as to keep out of the range of the cannon, approached
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the ancient palace of Holyrood, without having entered the walls of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the city. He then drew up his men in front of that venerable pile,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and delivered Waverley to the custody of a guard of Highlanders, whose
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: A long, low, and ill-proportioned gallery, hung with pictures, affirmed
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to be the portraits of kings, who, if they ever flourished at all, lived
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: several hundred years before the invention of painting in oil colours,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: served as a sort of guard-chamber, or vestibule, to the apartments
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: which the adventurous Charles Edward now occupied in the palace of his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: ancestors. Officers, both in the Highland and Lowland garb, passed and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: repassed in haste, or loitered in the hall, as if waiting for orders.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Secretaries were engaged in making out passes, musters, and returns.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: All seemed busy, and earnestly intent upon something of importance;
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: but Waverley was suffered to remain seated in the recess of a window,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: unnoticed by any one, in anxious reflection upon the crisis of his fate,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: which seemed now rapidly approaching.
