text: CHAPTER XL
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: AN OLD AND A NEW ACQUAINTANCE
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: While he was deep sunk in his reverie, the rustle of tartans was heard
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: behind him, a friendly arm clasped his shoulders, and a friendly voice
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: exclaimed,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Said the Highland prophet sooth?--or must second-sight go for nothing?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Waverley turned, and was warmly embraced by Fergus Mac-Ivor. 'A thousand
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: welcomes to Holyrood, once more possessed by her legitimate sovereign!
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Did I not say we should prosper, and that you would fall into the hands
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of the Philistines if you parted from us?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Dear Fergus!' said Waverley, eagerly returning his greeting, 'it is
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: long since I have heard a friend's voice. Where is Flora?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Safe, and a triumphant spectator of our success.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'In this place?' said Waverley.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Aye, in this city at least,' answered his friend, 'and you shall see
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: her; but first you must meet a friend whom you little think of, who has
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: been frequent in his inquiries after you.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Thus saying, he dragged Waverley by the arm out of the guard-chamber,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and, ere he knew where he was conducted, Edward found himself in a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: presence-room, fitted up with some attempt at royal state.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: A young man, wearing his own fair hair, distinguished by the dignity
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of his mien and the noble expression of his well-formed and regular
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: features, advanced out of a circle of military gentlemen and Highland
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: chiefs, by whom he was surrounded. In his easy and graceful manners
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Waverley afterwards thought he could have discovered his high birth and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: rank, although the star on his breast, and the embroidered garter at his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: knee, had not appeared as its indications.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Let me present to your Royal Highness,' said Fergus, bowing
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: profoundly--
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'The descendant of one of the most ancient and loyal families in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: England,' said the young Chevalier, interrupting him. 'I beg your pardon
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: for interrupting you, my dear Mac-Ivor; but no master of ceremonies is
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: necessary to present a Waverley to a Stuart.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Thus saying, he extended his hand to Edward with the utmost courtesy,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: who could not, had he desired it, have avoided rendering him the homage
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: which seemed due to his rank, and was certainly the right of his birth.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'I am sorry to understand, Mr. Waverley, that, owing to circumstances
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: which have been as yet but ill explained, you have suffered some
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: restraint among my followers in Perthshire, and on your march here; but
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: we are in such a situation that we hardly know our friends, and I
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: am even at this moment uncertain whether I can have the pleasure of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: considering Mr. Waverley as among mine.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: He then paused for an instant; but before Edward could adjust a suitable
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: reply or even arrange his ideas as to its purport, the Prince took out
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: a paper, and then proceeded:--'I should indeed have no doubts upon this
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: subject, if I could trust to this proclamation, set forth by the friends
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of the Elector of Hanover, in which they rank Mr. Waverley among the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: nobility and gentry who are menaced with the pains of high treason for
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: loyalty to their legitimate sovereign. But I desire to gain no adherents
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: save from affection and conviction; and if Mr. Waverley inclines
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to prosecute his journey to the south, or to join the forces of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Elector, he shall have my passport and free permission to do so; and I
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: can only regret, that my present power will not extend to protect him
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: against the probable consequences of such a measure.--But,' continued
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Charles Edward, after another short pause, 'if Mr. Waverley should, like
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: his ancestor, Sir Nigel, determine to embrace a cause which has little
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to recommend it but its justice, and follow a prince who throws
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: himself upon the affections of his people to recover the throne of his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: ancestors, or perish in the attempt, I can only say, that among these
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: nobles and gentlemen he will find worthy associates in a gallant
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: enterprise, and will follow a master who may be unfortunate, but, I
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: trust, will never be ungrateful.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The politic Chieftain of the race of Ivor knew his advantage in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: introducing Waverley to this personal interview with the royal
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Adventurer. Unaccustomed to the address and manners of a polished court,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: in which Charles was eminently skilful, his words and his kindness
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: penetrated the heart of our hero, and easily outweighed all prudential
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: motives. To be thus personally solicited for assistance by a Prince,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: whose form and manners, as well as the spirit which he displayed in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: this singular enterprise, answered his ideas of a hero of romance; to be
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: courted by him in the ancient halls of his paternal palace, recovered
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: by the sword which he was already bending towards other conquests, gave
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Edward, in his own eyes, the dignity and importance which he had ceased
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to consider as his attributes. Rejected, slandered, and threatened
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: upon the one side, he was irresistibly attracted to the cause which the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: prejudices of education, and the political principles of his family, had
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: already recommended as the most just. These thoughts rushed through
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: his mind like a torrent, sweeping before them every consideration of an
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: opposite tendency,--the time, besides, admitted of no deliberation,--and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Waverley, kneeling to Charles Edward, devoted his heart and sword to the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: vindication of his rights!
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The Prince (for, although unfortunate in the faults and follies of his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: forefathers, we shall here, and elsewhere, give him the title due to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: his birth) raised Waverley from the ground, and embraced him with an
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: expression of thanks too warm not to be genuine. He also thanked
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Fergus Mac-Ivor repeatedly for having brought him such an adherent, and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: presented Waverley to the various noblemen, chieftains, and officers
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: who were about his person, as a young gentleman of the highest hopes and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: prospects, in whose bold and enthusiastic avowal of his cause they might
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: see an evidence of the sentiments of the English families of rank at
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: this important crisis. [See Note 23.] Indeed, this was a point
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: much doubted among the adherents of the house of Stuart; and as a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: well-founded disbelief in the co-operation of the English Jacobites kept
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: many Scottish men of rank from his standard, and diminished the courage
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of those who had joined it, nothing could be more seasonable for the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Chevalier than the open declaration in his favour of the representative
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of the house of Waverley-Honour, so long known as cavaliers and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: royalists. This Fergus had foreseen from the beginning. He really loved
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Waverley, because their feelings and projects never thwarted each other;
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: he hoped to see him united with Flora, and he rejoiced that they were
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: effectually engaged in the same cause. But, as we before hinted, he also
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: exulted as a politician in beholding secured to his party a partisan of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: such consequence; and he was far from being insensible to the personal
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: importance which he himself gained with the Prince, from having so
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: materially assisted in making the acquisition.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Charles Edward, on his part, seemed eager to show his attendants the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: value which he attached to his new adherent, by entering immediately, as
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: in confidence, upon the circumstances of his situation. 'You have been
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: secluded so much from intelligence, Mr. Waverley, from causes of which
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: I am but indistinctly informed, that I presume you are even yet
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: unacquainted with the important particulars of my present situation. You
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: have, however, heard of my landing in the remote district of Moidart,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: with only seven attendants, and of the numerous chiefs and clans whose
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: loyal enthusiasm at once placed a solitary adventurer at the head of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: a gallant army. You must also, I think, have learned, that the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: commander-in-chief of the Hanoverian Elector, Sir John Cope, marched
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: into the Highlands at the head of a numerous and well-appointed military
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: force, with the intention of giving us battle, but that his courage
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: failed him when we were within three hours' march of each other, so that
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: he fairly gave us the slip, and marched northward to Aberdeen, leaving
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the Low Country open and undefended. Not to lose so favourable an
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: opportunity, I marched on to this metropolis, driving before me two
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: regiments of horse, Gardiner's and Hamilton's, who had threatened to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: cut to pieces every Highlander that should venture to pass Stirling;
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and while discussions were carrying forward among the magistracy
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and citizens of Edinburgh, whether they should defend themselves or
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: surrender, my good friend Lochiel (laying his hand on the shoulder
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of that gallant and accomplished chieftain) saved them the trouble of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: further deliberation, by entering the gates with five hundred Camerons.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Thus far, therefore, we have done well; but, in the meanwhile, this
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: doughty general's nerves being braced by the keen air of Aberdeen,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: he has taken shipping for Dunbar, and I have just received certain
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: information that he landed there yesterday. His purpose must
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: unquestionably be to march towards us to recover possession of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: capital. Now, there are two opinions in my council of war: one, that
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: being inferior probably in numbers, and certainly in discipline and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: military appointments, not to mention our total want of artillery, and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the weakness of our cavalry, it will be safest to fall back towards the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: mountains, and there protract the war, until fresh succours arrive from
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: France, and the whole body of the Highland clans shall have taken
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: arms in our favour. The opposite opinion maintains, that a retrograde
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: movement, in our circumstances, is certain to throw utter discredit on
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: our arms and undertaking; and, far from gaining us new partisans, will
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: be the means of disheartening-those who have joined our standard. The
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: officers who use these last arguments, among whom is your friend Fergus
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Mac-Ivor, maintain, that if the Highlanders are strangers to the usual
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: military discipline of Europe, the soldiers whom they are to encounter
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: are no less strangers to their peculiar and formidable mode of attack;
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: that the attachment and courage of the chiefs and gentlemen are not to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: be doubted; and that as they will be in the midst of the enemy, their
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: clansmen will as surely follow them; in fine, that having drawn the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: sword, we should throw away the scabbard, and trust our cause to battle,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and to the God of Battles. Will Mr. Waverley favour us with his opinion
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: in these arduous circumstances?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Waverley coloured high betwixt pleasure and modesty at the distinction
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: implied in this question, and answered, with equal spirit-and readiness,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: that he could not venture to offer an opinion as derived from military
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: skill, but that the counsel would be far the most acceptable to him
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: which should first afford him an opportunity to evince his zeal in his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Royal Highness's service.

text: regularity; so that a general must have praised the conclusion, though a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: martinet might have ridiculed the method by which it was attained.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The sort of complicated medley created by the hasty arrangements of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: various clans under their respective banners, for the purpose of getting
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: into the order of march, was in itself a gay and lively spectacle. They
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: had no tents to strike, having generally, and by choice, slept upon the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: open field, although the autumn was now waning, and the nights began to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: be frosty. For a little space, while they were getting into order, there
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was exhibited a changing, fluctuating; and confused appearance of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: waving tartans and floating plumes, and of banners displaying the proud
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: gathering word of Clanronald, GANION COHERIGA (Gainsay who dares);
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: LOCH-SLOY, the watchword of the Mac-Farlanes; FORTH FORTUNE, AND FILL
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: THE FETTERS, the motto of the Marquis of Tuilibardine; BYDAND, that of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Lord Lewis Gordon; and the appropriate signal words and emblems of many
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: other chieftains and clans.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: At length the mixed and wavering multitude arranged themselves into a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: narrow and dusky column of great length, stretching through the whole
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: extent of the valley. In the front of the column the standard of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Chevalier was displayed, bearing at red cross upon a white ground,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: with the motto TANDEM TRIUMPHANS. The few cavalry being chiefly Lowland
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: gentry, with their domestic servants and retainers, formed the advanced
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: guard of the army; and their standards, of which they had rather too
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: many in respect of their numbers, were seen waving upon the extreme
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: verge of the horizon. Many horsemen of this body, among whom Waverley
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: accidentally remarked Balmawhapple, and his lieutenant, Jinker (which
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: last, however, had been reduced, with several others, by the advice of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the Baron of Bradwardine, to the situation of what he called reformed
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: officers, or reformadoes), added to the liveliness, though by no means
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to the regularity, of the scene, by galloping their horses as fast
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: forward as the press would permit, to join their proper station in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the van. The fascinations of the Circes of the High Street, and the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: potations of strength with which they had been drenched over night, had
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: probably detained these heroes within the walls of Edinburgh somewhat
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: later than was consistent with their morning duty. Of such loiterers,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the prudent took the longer and circuitous, but more open route, to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: attain their place in the march, by keeping at some distance from the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: infantry, and making their way through the enclosures to the right, at
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the expense of leaping over or pulling down the dry-stone fences. The
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: irregular appearance and vanishing of these small parties of horsemen,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: as well as the confusion occasioned by those who endeavoured, though
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: generally without effect, to press to the front through the crowd of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Highlanders, maugre their curses, oaths, and opposition, added to the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: picturesque wildness what it took from the military regularity of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: scene.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: While Waverley gazed upon this remarkable spectacle, rendered yet more
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: impressive by the occasional discharge of cannon-shot from the Castle
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: at the Highland guards as they were withdrawn from its vicinity to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: join their main body, Callum, with his usual freedom of interference,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: reminded him that Vich Ian Vohr's folk were nearly at the head of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: column of march, which was still distant, and that 'they would gang very
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: fast after the cannon fired.' Thus admonished, Waverley walked briskly
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: forward, yet often easting a glance upon the darksome clouds of warriors
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: who were collected before and beneath him. A nearer view, indeed,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: rather diminished the effect impressed on the mind by the more distant
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: appearance of the army. The leading men of each clan were well armed
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: with broadsword, target, and fusee, to which all added the dirk, and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: most the steel pistol. But these consisted of gentlemen, that is,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: relations of the chief, however distant, and who had an immediate title
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to his countenance and protection. Finer and hardier men could not
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: have been selected out of any army in Christendom; while the free and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: independent habits which each possessed, and which each was yet so well
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: taught to subject to the command of his chief, and the peculiar mode of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: discipline adopted in Highland warfare, rendered them equally formidable
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: by their individual courage and high spirit, and from their rational
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: conviction of the necessity of acting in unison, and of giving their
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: national mode of attack the fullest opportunity of success.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: But, in a lower rank to these, there were found individuals of an
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: inferior description, the common peasantry of the Highland country,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: who, although they did not allow themselves to be so called, and claimed
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: often, with apparent truth, to be of more ancient descent than the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: masters whom they served, bore, nevertheless, the livery of extreme
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: penury, being indifferently accoutred, and worse armed, half naked,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: stinted in growth, and miserable in aspect. Each important clan had some
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of those Helots attached to them;--thus, the Mac-Couls, though tracing
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: their descent from Comhal, the father of Finn or Fingal, were a sort
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of Gibeonites, or hereditary servants to the Stewarts of Appin; the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Macbeths, descended from the unhappy monarch of that name, were subjects
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to the Morays, and clan Donnochy, or Robertsons of Athole; and many
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: other examples might be given, were it not for the risk of hurting any
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: pride of clanship which may yet be left, and thereby drawing a Highland
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: tempest into the shop of my publisher. Now these same Helots, though
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: forced into the field by the arbitrary authority of the chieftains under
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: whom they hewed wood and drew water, were, in general, very sparingly
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: fed, ill dressed, and worse armed. The latter circumstance was indeed
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: owing chiefly to the general disarming act, which had been carried into
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: effect ostensibly through the whole Highlands, although most of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: chieftains contrived to elude-its influence, by retaining the weapons
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of their own immediate clansmen, and delivering up those of less value,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: which they collected from these inferior satellites. It followed, as a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: matter of course, that, as we have already hinted, many of these poor
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: fellows were brought to the field in a very wretched condition.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: From this it happened, that, in bodies, the van of which were admirably
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: well armed in their own fashion, the rear resembled actual banditti.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Here was a pole-axe, there a sword without a scabbard; here a gun
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: without a lock, there a scythe set straight upon a pole; and some had
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: only their dirks, and bludgeons or stakes pulled out of hedges. The
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: grim, uncombed, and wild appearance of these men, most of whom gazed
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: with all the admiration of ignorance upon the most ordinary production
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of domestic art, created surprise in the Lowlands, but it also created
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: terror. So little was the condition of the Highlands known at that late
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: period, that the character and appearance of their population,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: while thus sallying forth as military adventurers, conveyed to the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: south-country Lowlanders as much surprise as if an invasion of African
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Negroes or Esquimaux Indians had issued forth from the northern
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: mountains of their own native country. It cannot therefore be wondered
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: if Waverley, who had hitherto judged of the Highlanders generally from
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the samples which the policy of Fergus had from time to time exhibited,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: should have felt damped and astonished at the daring attempt of a body
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: not then exceeding four thousand men, and of whom not above half the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: number, at the utmost, were armed, to change the fate, and alter the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: dynasty, of the British kingdoms.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: As he moved along the column, which still remained stationary, an iron
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: gun, the only piece of artillery possessed by the army which meditated
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: so important a revolution, was fired as the signal of march. The
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Chevalier had expressed a wish to leave this useless piece of ordnance
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: behind him; but, to his surprise, the Highland chiefs interposed to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: solicit that it might accompany their march, pleading the prejudices of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: their followers, who, little accustomed to artillery, attached a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: degree of absurd importance to this field-piece, and expected it would
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: contribute essentially to a victory which they could only owe to their
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: own muskets and broadswords. Two or three French artillerymen were
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: therefore appointed to the management of this military engine, which
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was drawn along by a string of Highland ponies, and was, after all, only
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: used for the purpose of firing signals. [See Note 25.]
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: No sooner was its voice heard upon the present occasion, than the whole
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: line was in motion. A wild cry of joy from the advancing battalions rent
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the air, and was then lost in the shrill clangour of the bagpipes, as
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the sound of these, in their turn, was partially drowned by the heavy
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: tread of so many men put at once into motion. The banners glittered
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and shook as they moved forward, and the horse hastened to occupy their
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: station as the advanced guard, and to push on reconnoitring parties
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to ascertain and report the motions of the enemy. They vanished from
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Waverley's eye as they wheeled round the base of Arthur's seat, under
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the remarkable ridge of basaltic rocks which fronts the little lake of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Duddingston.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The infantry followed in the same direction, regulating their pace by
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: another body which occupied a road more to the southward. It cost Edward
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: some exertion of activity to attain the place which Fergus's followers
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: occupied in the line of march.

author: Scott, Walter

text: CHAPTER XLV
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: AN INCIDENT GIVES RISE TO UNAVAILING REFLECTIONS
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: When Waverley reached that part of the column which was filled by
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the clan of Mac-Ivor, they halted, formed, and received him with a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: triumphant flourish upon the bagpipes, and a loud shout of the men, most
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of whom knew him personally, and were delighted to see him in the dress
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of their country and of their sept. 'You shout,' said a Highlander of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: a neighbouring clan to Evan Dhu, 'as if the Chieftain were just come to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: your head.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: MAR E BRAN IS E BRATHAIR, If it be not Bran, it is Bran's brother,' was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the proverbial reply of Maccombich. [Bran, the well-known dog of Fingal,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: is often the theme of Highland proverb as well as song.]
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Oh, then, it is the handsome Sassenach Duinhe-wassel, that is to be
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: married to Lady Flora?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'That may be, or it may not be; and it is neither your matter nor mine,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Gregor.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Fergus advanced to embrace the volunteer, and afford him a warm and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: hearty welcome; but he thought it necessary to apologize for the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: diminished numbers of his battalion (which did not exceed three hundred
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: men), by observing, he had sent a good many out upon parties.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The real fact, however, was, that the defection of Donald Bean Lean had
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: deprived him of at least thirty hardy fellows, whose services he had
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: fully reckoned upon, and that many of his occasional adherents had been
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: recalled by their several chiefs to the standards to which they most
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: properly owed their allegiance. The rival chief of the great northern
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: branch also of his own clan, had mustered his people, although he had
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: not yet declared either for the Government or for the Chevalier, and by
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: his intrigues had in some degree diminished the force with which
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Fergus took the field. To make amends for these disappointments, it was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: universally admitted that the followers of Vich Ian Vohr, in point of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: appearance, equipment, arms, and dexterity in using them, equalled the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: most choice troops which followed the standard of Charles Edward. Old
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Ballenkeiroch acted as his major; and, with the other officers who had
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: known Waverley when at Glennaquoich, gave our hero a cordial reception,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: as the sharer of their future dangers and expected honours.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The route pursued by the Highland army, after leaving the village of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Duddingston, was for some time the common post-road betwixt Edinburgh
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and Haddington, until they crossed the Esk at Musselburgh, when, instead
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of keeping the low grounds towards the sea, they turned more inland, and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: occupied the brow of the eminence called Carberry hill, a place already
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: distinguished in Scottish history as the spot where the lovely Mary
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: surrendered herself to her insurgent subjects. This direction was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: chosen, because the Chevalier had received notice that the army of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Government, arriving by sea from Aberdeen, had landed at Dunbar, and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: quartered the night before to the west of Haddington, with the intention
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of falling down towards the sea-side, and approaching Edinburgh by the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: lower coast-road. By keeping the height, which overhung that road in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: many places, it was hoped the Highlanders might find an opportunity of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: attacking them to advantage. The army therefore halted upon the ridge of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Carberry hill, both to refresh the soldiers, and as a central situation,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: from which their march could be directed to any point that the motions
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of the enemy might render most advisable. While they remained in this
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: position, a messenger arrived in haste to desire Mac-Ivor to come to the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Prince, adding, that their advanced post had had a skirmish with some of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the enemy's cavalry, and that the Baron of Bradwardine had sent in a few
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: prisoners.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the English general had chosen to approach the metropolis, both as most
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: was overlooked and commanded.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was heard to toll three as they hastened to the place where he lay.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: clans. A bundle of peas-straw, which had been lately his couch, now
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: served for his seat. Just as Fergus reached the circle, the consultation
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: had broken up. 'Courage, my brave friends!' said the Chevalier, 'and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: plain, upon which the enemy are lying. This difficulty surmounted,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Heaven and your good swords must do the rest.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: its right from off the ground on which they had rested, soon entered the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: wavered, halted, disbanded, and galloped from the field. The
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: artillerymen, deserted by the cavalry, fled after discharging their
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: pieces, and the Highlanders, who dropped their guns when fired, and drew
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: their broadswords, rushed with headlong fury against the infantry.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: It was at this moment of confusion and terror, that Waverley remarked an
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: English officer, apparently of high rank, standing alone and unsupported
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: by a field-piece, which, after the flight of the men by whom it was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: wrought, he had himself levelled and discharged against the clan of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Mac-Ivor, the nearest group of Highlanders within his aim. Struck
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: with his tall, martial figure, and eager to save him from inevitable
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: destruction, Waverley outstripped for an instant even the speediest of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the warriors, and, reaching the spot first, called to him to surrender.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The officer replied by a thrust with his sword, which Waverley received
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: in his target, and in turning it aside the Englishman's weapon broke.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: At the same time the battle-axe of Dugald Mahony was in the act of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: descending upon the officer's head. Waverley intercepted and prevented
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the blow, and the officer, perceiving further resistance unavailing,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and struck with Edward's generous anxiety for his safety, resigned the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: fragment of his sword, and was committed by Waverley to Dugald, with
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: strict charge to use him well, and not to pillage his person, promising
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: him, at the same time, full indemnification for the spoil.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: On Edward's right, the battle for a few minutes raged fierce and thick.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The English infantry, trained in the wars in Flanders, stood their
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: ground with great courage. But their extended files were pierced and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: broken in many places by the close masses of the clans; and in the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: personal struggle which ensued, the nature of the Highlanders' weapons,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and their extraordinary fierceness and activity, gave them a decided
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: superiority over those who had been accustomed to trust much to their
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: array and discipline, and felt that the one was broken and the other
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: useless. Waverley, as he cast his eyes towards this scene of smoke and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: slaughter, observed Colonel Gardiner, deserted by his own soldiers in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: spite of all his attempts to rally them, yet spurring his horse through
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the field to take the command of a small body of infantry, who, with
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: their backs arranged against the wall of his own park (for his house
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was close by the field of battle), continued a desperate and unavailing
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: resistance. Waverley could perceive that he had already received many
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: wounds, his clothes and saddle being marked with blood. To save this
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: good and brave man, became the instant object of his most anxious
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: exertions. But he could only witness his fall. Ere Edward could make
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: his way among the Highlanders, who, furious and eager for spoil, now
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: thronged upon each other, he saw his former commander brought from his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: horse by the blow of a scythe, and beheld him receive, while on the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: ground, more wounds than would have let out twenty lives. When Waverley
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: came up, however, perception had not entirely fled. The dying warrior
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: seemed to recognize Edward, for he fixed his eye upon him with an
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: upbraiding, yet sorrowful look, and appeared to struggle for utterance.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: But he felt that death was dealing closely with him, and resigning his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: purpose, and folding his hands as if in devotion, he gave up his soul
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to his Creator. The look with which he regarded Waverley in his dying
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: moments did not strike him so deeply at that crisis of hurry and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: confusion, as when it recurred to his imagination at the distance of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: some time. [See Note 27.]
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Loud shouts of triumph now echoed over the whole field. The battle was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: fought and won, and the whole baggage, artillery, and military stores
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of the regular army remained in possession of the victors. Never was a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: victory more complete. Scarce any escaped from the battle, excepting the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: cavalry, who had left it at the very onset, and even these were broken
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: into different parties and scattered all over the country. So far as our
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: tale is concerned, we have only to relate the fate of Balmawhapple, who,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: mounted on a horse as headstrong and stiff-necked as his rider, pursued
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the flight of the dragoons above four miles from the field of battle,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: when some dozen of the fugitives took heart of grace, turned round, and,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: cleaving his skull with their broadswords, satisfied the world that
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the unfortunate gentleman had actually brains, the end of his life thus
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: giving proof of a fact greatly doubted during its progress. His death
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was lamented by few. Most of those who knew him agreed in the pithy
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: observation of Ensign Maccombich, that there 'was mair TINT (lost) at
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Sheriff-Muir.' His friend, Lieutenant Jinker, bent his eloquence only
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to exculpate his favourite mare from any share in contributing to the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: catastrophe. 'He had tauld the laird a thousand times,' he said, 'that
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: it was a burning shame to put a martingale upon the puir thing, when he
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: would needs ride her wi' a curb of half a yard lang; and that he could
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: na but bring himsell (not to say her) to some mischief, by flinging her
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: down, or otherwise; whereas, if he had had a wee bit rinnin ring on the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: snaffle, she wad ha' rein'd as cannily as a cadger's pownie.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Such was the elegy of the Laird of Balmawhapple. [See Note 28.]

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of Bradwardine, returning from the duty of the day, and having disposed
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: those under his command in their proper stations, sought the Chieftain
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of Glennaquoich and his friend Edward Waverley. He found the former
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: busied in determining disputes among his clansmen about points of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: precedence and deeds of valour, besides sundry high and doubtful
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: questions concerning plunder. The most important of the last respected
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the property of a gold watch, which had once belonged to some
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: awarded consoled himself by observing, 'She (i.e. the watch, which he
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: took for a living animal) died the very night Vich Ian Vohr gave her to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Murdock;' the machine having, in fact, stopped for want of winding up.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: It was just when this important question was decided, that the Baron of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Bradwardine, with a careful and yet important expression of countenance,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: joined the two young men. He descended from his reeking charger, the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: care of which he recommended to one of his grooms. 'I seldom ban, sir,'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: said he to the man; 'but if you play any of your hound's-foot tricks,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and leave puir Berwick before he's sorted, to rin after spuilzie, deil
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: be wi' me if I do not; give your craig a thraw. He then stroked with
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: great complacency the animal which had borne him through the fatigues of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the day, and having taken a tender leave of him,--'Weel, my good young
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: friends, a glorious and decisive victory,' said he; 'but these loons of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: troopers fled ower soon. I should have liked to have shown you the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: true points of the PRAELIUM EQUESTRE, or equestrian combat, whilk their
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: cowardice has postponed, and which I hold to be the pride and terror

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: admit I could not be so far BEN as you lads, being that it was my point

author: Scott, Walter

text: of duty to keep together our handful of horse. And no cavalier ought
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: blessing of God, may be his own case.--But, Glennaquoich, and you, Mr.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Waverley, I pray ye to give me your best advice on a matter of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: mickle weight, and which deeply affects the honour of the house of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Bradwardine.--I crave your pardon, Ensign Maccombich, and yours,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Inveraughlin, and yours, Edderalshendrach, and yours, sir.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The last person he addressed was Ballenkeiroch, who, remembering the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: death of his son, loured on him with a look of savage defiance. The
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Baron, quick as lightning at taking umbrage, had already bent his brow,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: when Glennaquoich dragged his major from the spot, and remonstrated
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: with him, in the authoritative tone of a chieftain, on the madness of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: reviving a quarrel in such a moment.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'The ground is cumbered with carcases,' said the old mountaineer,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: turning sullenly away; 'ONE MORE would hardly have been kenn'd upon
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: it; and if it wasna for yoursell, Vich Ian Vohr, that one should be
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Bradwardine's or mine.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The chief soothed while he hurried him away; and then returned to the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Baron. 'It is Ballenkeiroch,' he said, in an under and confidential
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: voice, 'father of the young man who fell eight years since in the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: unlucky affair at the Mains.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Ah!' said the Baron, instantly relaxing the doubtful sternness of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: his features, 'I can take mickle frae a man to whom I have unhappily
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: rendered sie a displeasure as that. Ye were right to apprize me,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Glennaquoich; he may look as black as midnight at Martinmas ere Cosmo
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Comyne Bradwardine shall say he does him wrang. Ah! I have nae male
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: lineage, and I should bear with one I have made childless, though
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: you are aware the blood-wit was made up to your ain satisfaction by
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: assythment, and that I have since expedited letters of slains.--Weel, as
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: I have said, I have no male issue, and yet it is needful that I maintain
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the honour of my house; and it is on that score I prayed ye for your
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: peculiar and private attention.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The two young men awaited to hear him in anxious curiosity.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'I doubt na, lads,' he proceeded, 'but your education has been sae seen
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to, that ye understand the true nature of the feudal tenures?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Fergus, afraid of an endless dissertation, answered, 'Intimately,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Baron,' and touched Waverley, as a signal to express no ignorance.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'And ye are aware, I doubt not, that the holding of the Barony of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Bradwardine is of a nature alike honourable and peculiar, being blanch
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: (which Craig opines ought to be Latinated BLANCUM, or rather FRANCUM, a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: free holding) PRO SERVITIO DETRAHENDI, SEU EXUENDI, CALIGAS REGIS POST
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: BATTALIAM.' Here Fergus turned his falcon eye upon Edward, with an
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: almost imperceptible rise of his eyebrow, to which his shoulders
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: corresponded in the same degree of elevation. 'Now, twa points of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: dubitation occur to me upon this topic. First, whether this service,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: or feudal homage, be at any event due to the person of the Prince,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the words being, PER EXPRESSUM, CALIGAS REGIS, the boots of the king
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: himself; and I pray your opinion anent that particular before we proceed
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: further.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Why, he is Prince Regent,' answered Mac-Ivor, with laudable composure
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of countenance; 'and in the court of France all the honours are rendered
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to the person of the Regent which are due to that of the King. Besides,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: were I to pull off either of their boots, I would render that service to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the young Chevalier ten times more willingly than to his father.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Aye, but I talk not of personal predilections. However, your authority
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: is of great weight as to the usages of the court of France: and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: doubtless the Prince, as ALTER EGO, may have a right to claim the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: HOMAGIUM of the great tenants of the crown, since all faithful subjects
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: are commanded, in the commission of regency, to respect him as the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: king's own person. Far, therefore, be it from me to diminish the lustre
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of his authority, by withholding this act of homage, so peculiarly
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: calculated to give it splendour; for I question if the Emperor of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Germany hath his boots taken off by a free baron of the empire. But
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: here lieth the second difficulty--The Prince wears no boots, but simply
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: brogues and trews.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: This last dilemma had almost disturbed Fergus's gravity.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Why,' said he, 'you know, Baron, the proverb tells us, "It's ill taking
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

text: the breeks off a Highlandman,"--and the boots are here in the same
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

text: predicament.'

author: Scott, Walter

text: 'The word CALIGAE, however,' continued the Baron, 'though I admit, that,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: by family tradition, and even in our ancient evidents, it is explained
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: 'It will so, my dear Glennaquoich;--and the words are express:

text: wherewith they are bound; whereas SOCCI, which may be analogous to our
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

text: confinement, rendered harsher to him by his habits of life, his natural
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

text: which this calamity had come upon him. I cannot disguise from you my
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: feelings upon this occasion; they were most painfully unfavourable
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to you. Having, by my family interest, which you probably know is not
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: inconsiderable, succeeded in obtaining Sir Everard's release, I set
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: out for Scotland. I saw Colonel Gardiner, a man whose fate alone is
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: sufficient to render this insurrection for ever execrable. In the course
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of conversation with him, I found, that, from late circumstances, from
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: a re-examination of the persons engaged in the mutiny, and from his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: original good opinion of your character, he was much softened towards
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: you; and I doubted not, that if I could be so fortunate as to discover
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: you, all might yet be well. But this unnatural rebellion has ruined
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: all. I have, for the first time in a long and active military life, seen
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Britons disgrace themselves by a panic flight, and that before a foe
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: without either arms or discipline: and now I find the heir of my dearest
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter
