text: 'Oh,' replied Mac-Ivor, 'they think that, as on former occasions, the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: heading, hanging, and forfeiting, will chiefly fall to the lot of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Lowland gentry; that they will be left secure in their poverty and their
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: fastnesses, there, according to their proverb, "to listen to the wind
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: upon the hill till the waters abate." But they will be disappointed;
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: they have been too often troublesome to be so repeatedly passed over,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and this time John Bull has been too heartily frightened to recover his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: good humour for some time. The Hanoverian ministers always deserved
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to be hanged for rascals; but now, if they get the power in their
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: hands,--as, sooner or later, they must, since there is neither rising
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: in England nor assistance from France,--they will deserve the gallows as
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: fools, if they leave a single clan in the Highlands in a situation to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: be again troublesome to Government. Aye, they will make root-and-branch
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: work, I warrant them.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'And while you recommend flight to me,' said Edward,--'a counsel which I
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: would rather die than embrace,--what are your own views?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Oh,' answered Fergus, with a melancholy air, 'my fate is settled. Dead
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: or captive I must be before to-morrow.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'What do you mean by that, my friend?' said Edward. 'The enemy is still
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: a day's march in our rear, and if he comes up, we are still strong
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: enough to keep him in check. Remember Gladsmuir.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'What I tell you is true notwithstanding, so far as I am individually
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: concerned.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Upon what authority can you found so melancholy a prediction?' asked
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Waverley.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'On one which never failed a person of my house. I have seen,' he said,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: lowering his voice, 'I have seen the Bodach Glas.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Bodach Glas?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Yes: have you been so long at Glennaquoich, and never heard of the Grey
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Spectre? though indeed there is a certain reluctance among us to mention
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: him.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'No, never.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Ah! it would have been a tale for poor Flora to have told you. Or,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: if that hill were Benmore, and that long blue lake, which you see just
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: winding towards yon mountainous country, were Loch Tay, or my own Loch
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: an Ri, the tale would be better suited with scenery. However, let us sit
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: down on this knell; even Saddleback and Ullswater will suit what I have
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to say better than the English hedgerows, enclosures, and farm-houses.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: You must know, then, that when my ancestor, Ian nan Chaistel, wasted
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Northumberland, there was associated with him in the expedition a sort
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of Southland Chief, or captain of a band of Low-landers, called Halbert
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Hall. In their return through the Cheviots, they quarrelled about the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: division of the great booty they had acquired, and came from words to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: blows. The Lowlanders were cut off to a man, and their chief fell the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: last, covered with wounds by the sword of my ancestor, Since that time,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: his spirit has crossed the Vich Ian Vohr of the day when any great
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: disaster was impending, but especially before approaching death. My
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: father saw him twice; once before he was made prisoner at Sheriff-Muir;
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: another time, on the morning of the day on which he died.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'How can you, my dear Fergus, tell such nonsense with a grave face?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'I do not ask you to believe it; but I tell you the truth, ascertained
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: by three hundred years' experience at least, and last night by my own
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: eyes.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'The particulars, for Heaven's sake!' said Waverley, with eagerness.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'I will, on condition you will not attempt a jest on the subject.--Since
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: this unhappy retreat commenced, I have scarce ever been able to sleep
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: for thinking of my clan, and of this poor Prince, whom they are leading
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: back like a dog in a string, whether he will or no, and of the downfall
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of my family. Last night I felt so feverish that I left my quarters, and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: walked out, in hopes the keen frosty air would brace my nerves--I cannot
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: tell how much I dislike going on, for I know you will hardly believe me.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: However--I crossed a small footbridge, and kept walking backwards and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: forwards, when I observed with surprise, by the clear moonlight, a tall
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: figure in a grey plaid, such as shepherds wear in the south of Scotland,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: which, move at what pace I would, kept regularly about four yards before
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: me.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'You saw a Cumberland peasant in his ordinary dress, probably.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'No: I thought so at first, and was astonished at the man's audacity
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: in daring to dog me. I called to him but received no answer. I felt an
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: anxious throbbing at my heart; and to ascertain what I dreaded, I stood
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: still, and turned myself on the same spot successively to the four
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: points of the compass--By Heaven, Edward, turn where I would, the figure
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was instantly before my eyes, at precisely the same distance! I was then
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: convinced it was the Bodach Glas. My hair bristled, and my knees shook.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: I manned myself, however, and determined to return to my quarters. My
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: ghastly visitant glided before me (for I cannot say he walked), until he
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: reached the footbridge: there he stopped, and turned full round. I must
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: either wade the river, or pass him as close as I am to you. A desperate
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: courage, founded on the belief that my death was near, made me resolve
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to make my way in despite of him. I made the sign of the cross, drew my
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: sword, and uttered, "In the name of God, Evil Spirit, give place!" "Vich
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Ian Vohr," it said, in a voice that made my very blood curdle, "beware
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of to-morrow!" It seemed at that moment not half a yard from my sword's
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: point; but the words were no sooner spoken than it was gone, and nothing
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: appeared further to obstruct my passage. I got home, and threw myself on
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: my bed, where I spent a few hours heavily enough; and this morning, as
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: no enemy was reported to be near us, I took my horse, and rode forward
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to make up matters with you. I would not willingly fall until I am in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: charity with a wronged friend.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Edward had little doubt that this phantom was the operation of an
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: exhausted frame and depressed spirits, working on the belief common to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: all Highlanders in such superstitions. He did not the less pity Fergus,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: for whom, in his present distress, he felt all his former regard revive.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: With the view of diverting his mind from these gloomy images, he offered
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: with the Baron's permission, which he knew he could readily obtain, to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: remain in his quarters till Fergus's corps should come up, and then to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: march with them as usual. The Chief seemed much pleased, yet hesitated
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to accept the offer.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'We are, you know, in the rear,--the post of danger in a retreat.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'And therefore the post of honour.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Well,' replied the Chieftain, 'let Alick have your horse in readiness,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: in case we should be over-matched, and I shall be delighted to have your
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: company once more.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The rearguard were late in making their appearance, having been delayed
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: by various accidents and by the badness of the roads. At length they
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: entered the hamlet. When Waverley joined the clan Mac-Ivor, arm in arm
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: with their Chieftain, all the resentment they had entertained against
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: him seemed blown off at once. Evan Dhu received him with a grin of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: congratulation; and even Callum, who was running about as active
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: as ever, pale indeed, and with a great patch on his head, appeared
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: delighted to see him.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'That gallows-bird's skull,' said Fergus, 'must be harder than marble:
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the lock of the pistol was actually broken.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'How could you strike so young a lad so hard?' said Waverley, with some
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: interest.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Why, if I did not strike hard sometimes, the rascals would forget
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: themselves.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: They were now in full march, every caution being taken to prevent
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: surprise. Fergus's people, and a fine clan regiment from Badenoch,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: commanded by Cluny Mac-Pherson, had the rear. They had passed a large
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: open moor, and were entering into the enclosures which surround a small
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: village called Clifton. The winter sun had set, and Edward began to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: rally Fergus upon the false predictions of the Grey Spirit. 'The Ides of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: March are not past,' said Mac-Ivor, with a smile; when, suddenly casting
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: his eyes back on the moor, a large body of cavalry was indistinctly seen
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to hover upon its brown and dark surface. To line the enclosures facing
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the open ground, and the road by which the enemy must move from it upon
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the village, was the work of a short time. While these manoeuvres were
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: accomplishing, night sunk down, dark and gloomy, though the moon was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: at full. Sometimes, however, she gleamed forth a dubious light upon the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: scene of action.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: The Highlanders did not remain long undisturbed in the defensive
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: position they had adopted. Favoured by the night, one large body of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: dismounted dragoons attempted to force the enclosures, while another,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: equally strong, strove to penetrate by the high road. Both were received
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: by such a heavy fire as disconcerted their ranks, and effectually
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: checked their progress. Unsatisfied with the advantage thus gained,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Fergus, to whose ardent spirit the approach of danger seemed to restore
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: all ifs elasticity, drawing his sword, and calling out 'Claymore!'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: encouraged his men, by voice and example, to break through the hedge
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: which divided them, and rush down upon the enemy. Mingling with the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: dismounted dragoons, they forced them, at the sword-point, to fly to the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: open moor, where a considerable number were cut to pieces. But the moon,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: which suddenly shone out, showed to the English the small number of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: assailants, disordered by their own success. Two squadrons of horse
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: moving to the support of their companions, the Highlanders endeavoured
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to recover the enclosures. But several of them, amongst others their
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: brave Chieftain, were cut off and surrounded before they could effect
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: their purpose. Waverley, looking eagerly for Fergus, from whom, as well
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: as from the retreating body of his followers, he had been separated in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the darkness and tumult, saw him, with Evan Dhu and Callum, defending
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: themselves desperately against a dozen of horsemen, who were hewing
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: at them with their long broadswords. The moon was again at that moment
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: totally overclouded, and Edward, in the obscurity, could neither bring
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: aid to his friends, nor discover which way lay his own road to rejoin
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the rear-guard. After once or twice narrowly escaping being slain or
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: made prisoner by parties of the cavalry whom he encountered in the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: darkness, he at length reached an enclosure, and clambering over it,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: concluded himself in safety, and on the way to the Highland forces,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: whose pipes he heard at some distance. For Fergus hardly a hope
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: remained, unless that he might be made prisoner. Revolving his fate
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: with sorrow and anxiety, the superstition of the Bodach Glas recurred to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Edward's recollection, and he said to himself, with internal surprise,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'What, can the devil speak truth?' [See Note 32.]
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: CHAPTER LX
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: CHAPTER OF ACCIDENTS
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Edward was in a most unpleasant and dangerous situation. He soon lost
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the sound of the bagpipes; and, what was yet more unpleasant, when,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: after searching long in vain, and scrambling through many enclosures, he
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: at length approached the high road, he learned, from the unwelcome noise
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of kettledrums and trumpets, that the English cavalry now occupied
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: it, and consequently were between him and the Highlanders. Precluded,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: therefore, from advancing in a straight direction, he resolved to avoid
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the English military, and endeavour to join his friends by making a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: circuit to the left, for which a beaten path deviating from the main
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: road in that direction seemed to afford facilities. The path was muddy,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and the night dark and cold; but even these inconveniences were hardly
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: felt amidst the apprehensions which falling into the hands of the King's
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: forces reasonably excited in his bosom.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: After walking about three miles, he at length reached a hamlet.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Conscious that the common people were in general unfavourable to the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: cause he had espoused, yet desirous, if possible, to procure a horse and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: guide to Penrith, where he hoped to find the rear, if not the main body,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of the Chevalier's army, he approached the ale-house of the place. There
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was a great noise within: he paused to listen. A round English oath or
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: two, and the burden of a campaign song, convinced him the hamlet also
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was occupied by the Duke of Cumberland's soldiers. Endeavouring to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: retire from it as softly as possible, and blessing the obscurity which
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: hitherto he had murmured against, Waverley groped his way the best he
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: could along a small paling, which seemed the boundary of some
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: cottage garden. As he reached the gate of this little enclosure, his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: outstretched hand was grasped by that of a female, whose voice at the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: same time uttered, 'Edward, is't thou, man?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Here is some unlucky mistake,' thought Edward, struggling, but gently,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to disengage himself.

text: Spontoon; so there will be no immediate danger. So pray feel your head

text: ache and your eyes grow heavy as soon as possible, that you may be put

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: In the morning the Colonel visited his guest.--'Now,' said he, 'I have
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: some good news for you. Your reputation as a gentleman and officer is
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: effectually cleared of neglect of duty, and accession to the mutiny in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Gardiner's regiment. I have had a correspondence on this subject with
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: a very zealous friend of yours, your Scottish parson, Morton; his first
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: letter was addressed to Sir Everard; but I relieved the good Baronet
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of the trouble of answering it. You must know, that your freebooting
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: acquaintance; Donald of the Cave, has at length fallen into the hands of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the Philistines. He was driving off the cattle of a certain proprietor,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: called Killan--something or other--'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Killancureit?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'The same. Now, the gentleman being, it seems, a great farmer, and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: having a special value for his breed of cattle--being, moreover, rather
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of a timid disposition, had got a party of soldiers to protect his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: property. So Donald ran his head unawares into the lion's mouth, and was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: defeated and made prisoner. Being ordered for execution, his conscience
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was assailed on the one hand by a Catholic priest,--on the other by
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: your friend Morton. He repulsed the Catholic chiefly on account of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: doctrine of extreme unction, which this economical gentleman considered
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: as an excessive waste of oil. So his conversion from a state of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: impenitence fell to Mr. Morton's share, who, I dare say, acquitted
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: himself excellently, though, I suppose, Donald made but a queer kind
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of Christian after all. He confessed, however, before a magistrate--one
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Major Melville, who seems to have been a correct, friendly sort of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: person--his full intrigue with Houghton, explaining particularly how it
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: was carried on, and fully acquitting you of the least accession to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: it. He also mentioned his rescuing you from the hands of the volunteer
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: officer, and sending you, by orders of the Pret--Chevalier, I mean as a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: prisoner to Doune, from whence he understood you were carried prisoner
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to Edinburgh. These are particulars which cannot but tell in your
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: favour. He hinted that he had been employed to deliver and protect you,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: that, though he would not have minded breaking any ordinary oath to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: satisfy the curiosity of Mr. Morton, to whose pious admonitions he owed
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: so much, yet in the present case he had been sworn to silence upon the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: edge of his dirk, [See Note 33.] which, it seems, constituted, in his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: opinion, an inviolable obligation.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'And what has become of him?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Oh, he was hanged at Stirling after the rebels raised the siege, with
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: his lieutenant, and four plaids besides; he having the advantage of a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: gallows more lofty than his friends.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Well, I have little cause either to regret or rejoice at his death; and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: yet he has done me both good and harm to a very considerable extent.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: His confession, at least, will serve you materially, since it wipes from
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: your character all those suspicions which gave the accusation against
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: unfortunate gentlemen, now or lately in arms against the Government, may
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: be justly charged. Their treason--I must give it its name, though you
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: participate in its guilt--is an action arising from mistaken virtue, and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: therefore cannot be classed as a disgrace, though it be doubtless highly
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: criminal. Where the guilty are so numerous, clemency must be extended to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: far the greater number; and I have little doubt of procuring a remission
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: for you, provided we can keep you out of the claws of justice till
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: she has selected and gorged upon her victims; for in this, as in other
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: cases, it will be according to the vulgar proverb, 'First come, first
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: served.' Besides, Government are desirous at present to intimidate the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: English Jacobites, among whom they can find few examples for punishment.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: This is a vindictive and timid feeling which will soon wear off, for, of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: all nations, the English are least bloodthirsty by nature. But it
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: exists at present, and you must therefore be kept out of the way in the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: meantime.'

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and even to Colonel Talbot. Which way to direct his course was now,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: therefore, the question.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'To Scotland,' said Waverley.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'To Scotland!' said the Colonel; 'with what purpose?--not to engage
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: again with the rebels, I hope?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'No--I considered my campaign ended, when, after all my efforts, I
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: could not rejoin them; and now, by all accounts, they are gone to make
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: a winter campaign in the Highlands, where such adherents as I am would
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: rather be burdensome than useful. Indeed, it seems likely that they only
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: prolong the war to place the Chevalier's person out of danger, and then
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to make some terms for themselves. To burden them with my presence would
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: merely add another party, whom they would not give up, and could not
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: defend. I understand they left almost all their English adherents in
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: garrison at Carlisle, for that very reason: and on a more general view,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Colonel, to confess the truth, though it may lower me in your opinion,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: I am heartily tired of the trade of war, and am, as Fletcher's Humorous
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Lieutenant says, "even as weary of this fighting"--'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Fighting! pooh, what have you seen but a skirmish or two?-Ah! if you
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: on each side!'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'I am not at all curious, Colonel.--"Enough," says our homely proverb,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: "is as good as a feast." The plumed troops and the big war used to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: wintry sky, and such accompaniments of the glorious trade, are not
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: times; and you, I should think--' He stopped.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: laughing; 'but, "'tis my vocation, Hal."'

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

author: Scott, Walter

text: again.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Why, to speak the very truth, there is a person in Scotland upon whom
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: whose situation I am very anxious.'

author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Then Emily was right, and there is a love affair in the case after

author: Scott, Walter

text: all?--And which of these two pretty Scotchwomen, whom you insisted upon

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

text: 'No.'

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: disposed for music, reading, or conversation. We have taken measures to

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: sitting. He had pushed forward in haste,--not, alas! with the most
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: distant hope of saving Fergus, but to see him for the last time. I ought
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to have mentioned, that he had furnished funds for the defence of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: prisoners in the most liberal manner, as soon as he heard that the day
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: of nature--the lawyers to avail themselves of the barely possible
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: occurrence of some legal flaw. Edward pressed into the court, which was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: prisoners, and people made way for him. It was the third sitting of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: the court, and there were two men at the bar. The verdict of GUILTY was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: already pronounced. Edward just glanced at the bar during the momentous
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: features of Fergus Mac-Ivor, although his dress was squalid, and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: imprisonment. By his side was Evan Maccombich. Edward felt sick and
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: dizzy as he gazed on them; but he was recalled to himself as the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Clerk of the Arraigns pronounced the solemn words: 'Fergus Mac-Ivor of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Glennaquoich, otherwise called Vich Ian Vohr, and Evan Mac-Ivor, in the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Dhu of Tarrascleugh, otherwise called Evan Dhu, otherwise called
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Evan Maccombich, or Evan Dhu Maccombich--you, and each of you, stand
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: attainted of high treason. What have you to say for yourselves why the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Court should not pronounce judgement against you, that you die according
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to law?'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Fergus, as the presiding Judge was putting on the fatal cap of
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: judgement, placed his own bonnet upon his head, regarded him with a
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: steadfast and stern look, and replied in a firm voice, 'I cannot let
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: this numerous audience suppose that to such an appeal I have no answer
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to make. But what I have to say, you would not bear to hear, for my
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: defence would be your condemnation. Proceed, then, in the name of God,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to do what is permitted to you. Yesterday, and the day before, you have
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: condemned loyal and honourable blood to be poured forth like water.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Spare not mine. Were that of all my ancestors in my veins, I would have
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: rise.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Evan Maccombich looked at him with great earnestness, and, rising
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: up, seemed anxious to speak; but the confusion of the court, and the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: which he was to express himself, kept him silent. There was a murmur
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of compassion among the spectators, from an idea that the poor fellow
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: crime. The Judge commanded silence, and encouraged Evan to proceed.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: 'I was only ganging to say, my lord,' said Evan, in what he meant to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: be in an insinuating manner, 'that if your excellent honour, and the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: again, that ony six o' the very best of his clan will be willing to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: be justified in his stead; and if you'll just let me gae down to
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Glennaquoich, I'll fetch them up to ye mysel, to head or hang, and you
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: may begin wi' me the very first man.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: in the court at the extraordinary nature of the proposal. The Judge
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: checked this indecency, and Evan, looking sternly around, when the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: murmur abated, 'If the Saxon gentlemen are laughing,' he said, 'because
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: a poor man, such as me, thinks my life, or the life of six of my degree,
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: is worth that of Vich Ian Vohr, it's like enough they may be very right;
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: silence ensued.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: of high treason, with all its horrible accompaniments. The execution was
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: hereafter.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: firm tone.

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: were moistened with a tear. 'For you, poor ignorant man,' continued the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Judge, 'who, following the ideas in which you have been educated, have
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: and state alone, is, from your unhappy ideas of clanship, transferred
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: to some ambitious individual, who ends by making you the tool of his
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: head.'
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Almost stupefied with his feelings, Edward found that the rush of the
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: house of a respectable Catholic family near Carlisle.
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: therefore, to exclude all such persons as had not the plea of near
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: next morning, before his irons were knocked off for execution.

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: left the room. Flora rose to receive him, and stretched out her hand,

author: Scott, Walter

text: but neither ventured to attempt speech. Her fine complexion was totally
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Dear Flora, if your strength of mind'--

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter

text: 'Whose name was Dickie Pearce.'

text: In Scotland the custom subsisted till late in the last century. At
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: Glamis Castle, is preserved the dress of one of the jesters, very
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: handsome, and ornamented with many bells. It is not above thirty years
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: since such a character stood by the sideboard of a nobleman of the first
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

text: rank in Scotland, and occasionally mixed in the conversation, till he
title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

title: Waverley; Or, 'Tis Sixty Years Since
author: Scott, Walter

author: Scott, Walter
